María works preparing and selling "chicha D. jora" (this is a delicious drink maD. from a corn base, which is much consumed in the north of Peru) and cornflour.  She has been doing this for about the last 10 years, as it is a practice that has been passed down from generation to generation.

Recently she has increased her sales of the chicha D. jora in the area where she lives; this has been a good thing in terms of increasing her income and improving the quality of life for her family.

As she has the opportunity to grow, María has requested a loan of 1,200 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more cornflour for making chicha D. jora and to buy utensils.  He goal is to get more earnings and increase her number of customers so as to pay back the loan being offered and so her family can get ahead little by little, especially her children.

loans.use: to buy more cornflour to continue preparing "chicha de jora" (a drink made from a corn base).

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 33 años, su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de triciclo. Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a este negocio, inicio cuando saco un préstamo y decidió comprar un triciclo fue así que Juan logro realizar su propio negocio, el tenia que luchar ya que tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. el ha enfrentado muchos desafíos como es reparar su unidad de trabajo ya que tiene realizar viajes largos. Ahora solicita este financiamiento para la compra de llantas, tapizar asientos y comprar lona.
texts.en: Juan Carlos is 33 years old. He has a business offering tricycle services. He has been doing this work for more than 8 years. It began when he took out a loan and decided to buy a tricycle, thereby establishing his own business. He has to work hard since he has 2 children who are dependent on him. He has faced many challenges, such as repairing his work unit, since he has to make long trips. He is currently requesting funding to buy tires, upholster seats and buy canvas.

loans.use: to purchase tires, upholster seats and purchase canvas.

loans.name: Fati

texts.fr:
FATI est une femme âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée à un monsieur qui est retraité et est  mère de 4 enfants.  Fati est une revendeuse depuis 2004, elle achète et revend à ses clients et  s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux de Lomé.
Fati demande son deuxième cycle de prêt pour l’achat de pagnes.
texts.en:
Fati is 46 years old. She is married to a retiree and has four children. 

She started selling pagnes (colorful West African cloth) in 2004. She buys her merchandise at the local markets of Lomé.

Fati is seeking a loan for the second time to stock up on pagnes.

loans.use: to buy pagnes for resale

loans.name: Jesukpego Group

texts.fr:
JESUKPEGO est un groupement constitué de treize personnes et dont la présidente(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Cécile. Les membres du groupe vivent dans le même village.Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la deuxième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Cécile est âgée de 37ans et vit au Bénin. Cécile ne vit plus avec son mari, mais seule avec ses trois enfants. Tous ses enfants sont scolarisés. Cécile a très peu fréquenté l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Cécile  mène comme activité la vente des poulets, des canards et des escargots. A côté de cette activité, Cécile vend des vêtements. Cécile exerce cette activité il y a une dizaine d’année environ, ce qui lui permet  d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille. Cécile s’approvisionne dans l’une des villes du Bénin. Ce deuxième prêt permettra certainement à Cécile et aux autres membres du groupement JESUKPEGO de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
.
texts.en:
JESUKPEGO is a group consisting of 30 people and whose president (the one who has the raised hand in the photo) is named Cécile. The members of the group live in the same village. To increase their working capital, the group seeks, for the second time, a loan from ALIDé. 

Cécile is 37-years-old and lives in Bénin. Cécile no longer lives with her husband but only with her three children. All of her children are in school. Cécile has very little schooling. In order to meet her needs and those of her children, Cécile conducts the business of selling chickens, ducks and snails. Alongside this activity, Cécile sells clothing. Cécile has been in this business for around ten years, enabling her to provide for the various family expenses. Cécile stocks up in one of the towns of Bénin. 

This second loan will certainly allow Cécile and the other members of the JESUKPEGO group to raise the level of their activity and to increase their customer base and their income.

loans.use: to buy chickens, ducks and clothing

loans.name: Percy David

texts.es:
Percy de 23 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Túcume que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y turística de los pobladores.

Percy se dedica desde hace un año a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes o a los distintos mercados de Chiclayo y Lambayeque y con los ingresos que obtenga pueda solventar los gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, al estar bien alimentados los puede ofrecer a sus clientes a un mejor precio,  con la finalidad de que obtenga  más ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Percy es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es salir adelante y seguir ayudando a sus padres en lo que sea necesario.
texts.en:
Percy is 23 years old.  He is single, and lives in his parents' home, which has running water and electricity.  He lives in the rural area of the Túcume district, which is part of the Lambayeque Department.  This area is characterized by its people working in agriculture, livestock, and tourism.

Percy has been working for the last year raising and selling pigs. His farmyard is in the rear of his house, and he feeds them a balanced animal feed.  Once they are fully grown to their optimum size, he offers them for sale to his customers, or to the various markets in Chiclayo and Lambayeque, and with the income he earns he is able to cover his personal expenses.

He has requested a loan of 1,500 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their feed, so that they can be well fed and he can offer them for sale to his customers for a better price.  His end-goal is to generate more income so he can have a better quality of life.

Percy is a hard-working and very responsible person; the only thing he wants is to get ahead in life, and to continue helping his parents with whatever they need.

loans.use: to buy animals and their feed.

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr:
Kayi est une femme âgée de 43 ans. elle est mariée à un monsieur qui est juriste. Elle a 3 enfants. Kayi est une revendeuse depuis 1996, elle achète et revend à ses clients des produits d’alimentation générale dans sa boutique. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé.
Elle sollicite de WAGE son premier cycle de prêt pour acheter divers produits d’alimentation générale afin d’agrandir sa boutique.
texts.en:
Kayi is 43 years old. She is married to a lawyer and has three children. 

Kayi started selling general food products in 1996. She runs her business out of her shop, and buys her merchandise at the Grand Market in Lomé.

She is seeking her first loan from WAGES to buy various food items. Her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy general food products for resale

loans.name: Saidu K.'s Group

texts.en:
Presented to you above in the photo are members of a primary school in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 9,400,000 SLL in order to meet their immediate financial problems.  At the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries. 
Their leader is Saidu. Saidu was born in Makeni, 43 years ago. He is married, and the couple has 4 children.  Three of the children are attending primary and secondary schools. Saidu is pursuing further studies. He has requested this loan in order to pay his college fees.

loans.use: to pay his college fees

loans.name: Early Fredy

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El  socio Early; tiene 28 años de edad, el socio es conviviente; él socio tiene 1 hijo de 2 años de edad;  el socio es policía, el socio trabaja en una institución del estado, el socio también paralelamente a su trabajo tiene un restaurante el cual requiere implementar, el socio  desea el crédito para implementar su restaurante el socio desea pintar el local, comprar sillas, mesas y mas cubiertos. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de sillas, mesas, cubiertos y pintura del local.

El  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Early is a member of the Comuzone II communal bank, which is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province and department of Cusco.

Early is 28 and lives with his partner. They have 1 son, who is 2 years old. He is a policeman and works in a state institution. Along with his job, Early also has a restaurant. He needs a loan to set up his restaurant. He wants to paint his place and to buy chairs, tables and more place settings. He is requesting the loan to pay for these items.

Early is grateful for the support provided him and is committed to making his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables and place settings and to paint his restaurant.

loans.name: Yuli Yohana

texts.es:
Yuli de 25 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de  luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Yuli desde hace unos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (gallinas y pavos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.  También comercializa ropa para damas lo que le permite tener otro ingreso para su hogar

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado y mercadería para seguir ofreciendolo a sus clientes, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Yuli es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia con la finalidad de que logren sus objetivos que se han planteado.
texts.en:
Yuli is 25 years old.  She lives with her family in her own home, which only has electricity (no running water).  Her home is located in the rural area of the Tambogrande district, which is part of the Piura department.  This area has agriculture, livestock and handicrafts.

For several years, Yuli has been raising and selling farmyard poultry (chickens and turkeys). Her farmyard is in the rear of her home, and is spacious and suitable for this.  She feeds them with a balanced feed, so that her poultry are able to reach an optimum size and she can offer them for sale in the different area markets and so get good earnings to cover her family's expenses.  She also sells women's clothing which provides her with another source of incomer for her household.

She has requested a loan of 500 New Soles form Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and merchandise that she can continue selling to her customers.  With the earnings from the sale of her poultry, she will be able to cover her loan as well as have a better quality of life.  

Yuli is a person with much drive and much determination to move her family ahead in life, with the end goal of achieving her planned objectives.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her poultry, and merchandise for her other business.

loans.name: Manuel Enrique

texts.es:
El  socio pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El  socio Manuel; tiene 23 años de edad, el socio es soltero; él socio es estudiante de la carrera profesional de Contabilidad en la universidad nacional, el socio  paralelamente a sus estudios trabaja con sus padres en la empresa familiar que ellos tiene, el socio ha estado trabajando con ellos en la empresa y aprendiendo mas de sus carrera en contabilidad llevando las cuentas junto a sus padres, el socio ahora esta independizándose y él mismo desea invertir en su propia empresa, el socio ha ahorrado y junto al crédito que desea obtener por este medio, él pondrá su propia empresa, para la cual requiere implementar con la compra de una computadora para su empresa. él socio estará abocado principalmente al área contable en su empresa. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una computadora para su empresa.

El  socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Manuel belongs to the “COMUZONE II” communal bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Manuel is 23 and single. He is an accounting student at the national university. On top of his studies he works with his parents in the family business. He has learned about accounting keeping accounts with his father. He is now becoming independent and he wants to invest in his own business. With his savings and this loan, he will start up his own business for which he needs a computer. He will be working in accounting in his new business. He is requesting this loan to purchase a computer.

He is grateful for the support offered and promises to repay his quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase a computer for his business

loans.name: Flor Dayana

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia  Flor; tiene 27 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 1 hijo de 5 años de edad; La socia trabaja en un negocio independiente ella aprendió trabajando en diferentes salones de belleza el arte de la manicura, la socia trabaja ahora en sus propio negocio a una cuadra de la plaza de armas, ella tiene un negocio mixto, vende joyas de plata como aretes, pulseras, collares, anillos, prendedores, la socia también realiza manicura a los diferentes clientes. La socia requiere el préstamo para poder ayudar a su economía y a su capital de trabajo e invertir en la compra de platería para implementar su negocio.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Flor belongs to the “COMUZONE II” communal bank. The bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Flor is 27, single, and has one 5-year-old child. She works in an independent business. She learned the art of manicures through working in different beauty salons. She now works in her own business on the Plaza de Armas. She has a mixed business. She sells silver jewellery such as earrings, bracelets, necklaces, rings, and pins. She also does manicures for her clients. She needs this loan to increase her working capital and invest in the purchase of silver jewellery to stock her business.

She is grateful for the support that we are authorizing and promises to repay her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to increase her working capital and invest in the purchase of silver jewellery to stock her business.

loans.name: Mabel Betsabe

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Mabel; tiene 29 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 13, 8 meses de edad;  La socia trabaja en su propio  salón de belleza como manicurista ella realiza diversos trabajos en las uñas de sus clientas, la socia hace figuras, aplicados, aumento de uñas, en acrílico, en ceras, en gel y con muchas técnica logra bellos trabajos, la socia desea poder invertir el préstamo en la compra de esmaltes, secador de uñas, pinceles e incrementar sus salón para poder un día verlo crecer y ser famosos así tendría su sucursal de salones de belleza especialistas en uñas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la implementación de su negocio y comprar esmaltes de uñas de diversos colores y de buena calidad, comprar secador de uñas y pinceles de finos tamaños.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Mabel belongs to the “COMUZONE II” communal bank. It is located in the Huanchac District, in the province and department of Cusco.
Mabel is 29 and lives with her partner. She has 2 children ages 13 and 8 months. She works in her own beauty salon as a manicurist. She does various nail work; she paints shapes, does applications and nail extensions, and works with acrylics, wax, and gel. She is very skilled and creates beautiful results. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of nail polishes, a nail-dryer, brushes, and to expand her salon so that she can see it grow one day and be famous. She wants to have a chain of beauty salons specializing in nails. She is requesting a loan to invest in stocking her business, buying various colours of high-quality nail polish, a nail dryer, and fine brushes.

She is grateful for the support authorized and promises to repay her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in stocking her business: to purchase high-quality nail polishes in various colours, a nail-drying machine, and fine brushes.

loans.name: Chonimabaj 2 Group

texts.es:
El señor Oscar Rene, es casado, tiene 38 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijas las cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de cinturones de diferente colores, tamaño y diseños, inicio este negocio cono empleados para otro negocio y lleva hasta el momento 7 años de experiencia.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de mercadería que consiste en cinturones en diferentes variedades, en el futuro espera ver su negocio bien establecido y con mejor control contable. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a las actividades de crianza de animales, venta de ropa, y venta de cacahuates.
texts.en:
Oscar Rene is married, 38 years old, and never had an opportunity to study. He has 3 daughters, all of whom are studying. He sells belts of different colors, sizes and designs. Oscar began his business with employees of other businesses and now has 7 years experience.

He decided to solicit a loan to buy merchandise consisting of belts of different varieties. In the future, he hopes to see his business well established and with better accounting control.

The other members of the group are dedicated to activities such as animal raising, selling clothes, and selling peanuts.

loans.use: buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Alafia Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ALAFIA est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Birina est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Birina est âgée de 38 ans et est mariée à un certain Ibrahim. Le couple a deux enfants,tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par Birina  et son mari.  Birina n'a jamais été à l'école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Birina mène comme activité la vente des céréales(riz, haricot etc.)et des colliers. Birina mène cette activité depuis quatre ans. Birina s’approvisionne dans le plus grand marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Birina sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ALAFIA,un premier crédit.
texts.en:
Group Alafia is composed of three people who reside in the same district in Benin. The group's representative, named Birina, is the woman raising her hand in the picture.
Birina is 38 years old and is married to a man named Ibrahim. The couple has two children, who both attend school and are in their care. The various expenses of the household are taken care of by Birina and her husband.  Birina never went to school.
To support herself and her children, Birina is in the business of selling cereals (rice, beans, etc.) and necklaces colliers. Birina has been in this business for four years. She gets her supplies from Benin's largest market. In order to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and profit, Birina is requesting a first loan together with the other members of group Alafia.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and necklaces.

loans.name: Luz Del Transito

texts.es: Luz Del Transito tiene 38 años. Es madre de 2 hijos ellos están bajo su cargo. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es la venta de ropa nueva y cosméticos. Hace más de 7 años que se dedica a este negocio por lo que siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy responsable, y disfruta de su trabajo ya que comparte con muchas personas. Ella solicita el financiamiento para capital de trabajo para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, vestidos entre otros. Su mayor sueño es mantener su actividad económica ya que es el único medio de vida que ella tiene.
texts.en: Luz Del Transito is 38 years old. She is the mother of two children who are under her care. Her business is to sell new clothing and cosmetics. She has been in this business for over seven years. She has always enjoyed being a very responsible person, and she likes her work because she gets to share with a lot of people. She requests the loan in order to get working capital to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, suits, dresses, etc. Her biggest dream is to keep her business going, because it is her only means to make a living.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, suits, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Daniela Katherine

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Daniela; tiene 19 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia es estudiante de la carrera profesional de turismo en la universidad andina del Cusco, la socia está realizando sus prácticas profesional en la agencia de viajes de sus familia, la socia desea poder invertir el crédito en la mensualidad de sus carrera y en sus pasajes, ella obtendrá su remuneración a fin de mes de la agencia de viajes en la cual esta. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el pago de sus mensualidades y sus pasajes.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Daniela Katherine belongs to the “Comuzone II” Communal Bank, located in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Daniela is 19 years old, single, and a student in the tourism career field at the Universidad Andina del Cusco. She is  currently fulfilling her  professional practice in her family's travel agency. Daniela intends to use the loan to make her monthly payments towards her career fees and transportation. She will obtain remuneration at the end of each month from the travel agency where she works. 

Daniela is grateful for this help and she promises to comply in a disciplined manner with her scheduled payments.

loans.use: pay her monthly university fees and transportation.

loans.name: Herminia Alejandrina

texts.es:
Herminia tiene 44 años es casada y tiene 6 hijos los cuales tienen 25, 23, 22, 18, 17, 16 años de edad; vive con su familia en Pelileo que está cerca de Ambato. Herminia se considera una persona responsable y muy trabajadora.

Trabaja con un vecino en la confección de pantalones jeans en máquinas industriales. Trabaja con FODEMI ya por 2 años consecutivos, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de una máquina de coser de doble aguja, lo que ayudaría al incremento de su producción y al armado de los pantalones.

Su sueño es ver crecer a su negocio economicamente para poder dar a sus hijos el estudio.
texts.en:
Herminia is 44 years old. She is married and has six children who are 25, 23, 22, 18, 17 and 16 years old. She lives with her family in Pelileo, which is near Ambato. Herminia considers herself to be a responsible and very hardworking person.
She works with a neighbor sewing denim trousers on industrial sewing machines. She has worked with FODEMI for two consecutive years. The loan she requests is to purchase a double needle lockstitch sewing machine, which would help her increase her production and tailor the trousers.
Her dream is to see her business grow so she can give her children an education.

loans.use: to purchase a double needle lockstitch sewing machine.

loans.name: Myrian

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE II” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Myrian; tiene 27 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia se encuentra embazada, ella espera a sus primer hijo o hija aún no sabe el sexo de sus bebe; La socia se dedica  al negocio de mueblería la socia tiene su taller de confección de mueble, ella es la que diseña los muebles y ve los acabados finales como el tipo de tela a usar y los cojines, los aplique que le darán a los diferentes muebles de sala y comedor, la socia requiere el crédito en esta ocasión para invertir en la compra de materiales para su taller, ella está pensando en la compra de telas, botones, broches, cierres, apliques y otros.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Myrian belongs to the “Comuzone II” Communal Bank, located in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Myrian is 27 years old, married, and currently pregnant. She is awaiting her first child, although she doesn't know the sex of the baby yet. Myrian is a furniture maker and has her own furniture-making shop. She designs the furniture and sees it through until it's finished, even selecting the type of cloth to use and the cushions, including the decorative applications for the different types of living room and dining room furniture.  

Myrian needs the loan on this occasion to invest in the purchase of materials for her workshop. She is thinking of buying cloth, buttons, fasteners, zippers, decorations, and other items.

loans.use: buy materials for her furniture-making shop, including cloth, buttons, fasteners, zippers,decorations, and other things.

loans.name: Misericorde Gg Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MISERICORDE GG est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin. Le représentant du groupe, du nom de Ayegou Pascal est celui qui a la main levée sur la photo. Ayegou Pascal est âgé de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Ayegou Pascal est marié à une revendeuse du nom de du nom de Véronique. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par Ayegou Pascal et sa femme. Ayegou Pascal n'a fréquenté que le secondaire.Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants,Ayegou Pascal fait le maraichage.Ayegou Pascal mène cette activité depuis six ans. Ayegou Pascal s’approvisionne en engrais, en insecticide et en graines dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Ayegou Pascal sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MISERICORDE GG, un premier crédit.
texts.en:
The group MISERICORDE GG (“mercy”) consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood in Benin. The representative of the group is Ayegou Pascal, seen with his hand raised in the photo. Ayegou Pascal is 29 years old and married to a reseller named Veronique. They have three dependent children who go to school. Ayegou Pascal attended high school. The couple handle together the various family responsibilities. 

Ayegou Pascal supports himself and his family through market gardening, an activity he has been practicing for six years. He buys fertilizers, insecticides and seeds at a market in Benin. In order to satisfy his customers and increase his revenue and profits, Ayegou Pascal is seeking a first group loan together with the other members of MISERICORDE GG.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and seeds for his market gardening activity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animals to raise

loans.name: Darlin Maria

texts.es: Darlin Maria tiene 28 años. Por lo que no es la primera experiencia que ha tenido con los financiamientos. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es un kiosco. Hace más de 20 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella desde muy joven ha trabajado, ya que desde niña empezó con su madre, pero su esposo le brindo el apoyo para empezar este negocio. Ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo para la compra de golosinas, pan, galletas, frutas entre otros. Su deseo es que sus hijos logren finalizar sus estudios para que sean personas de bien y con un buen futuro.
texts.en: Darlin Maria is 28 years old.  As such, this is not her first experience with financing.  Her business is running a snack stand.  She has been in this business for over 20 years.  She has worked since she was very young, starting from when she was a little girl working with her mother, but her husband provided her with the support to start this business.  She is asking for this loan for working capital to buy candy, bread, cookies, and fruit, among other things.  Her wish is for her children to finish school so that they will be good people with bright futures.

loans.use: to buy candy, bread, cookies, and fruit, among other things

loans.name: Mohamed Desmond's Group

texts.en:
Presented to you in the photo above are members of a primary school in Marampa village, in northern Sierra Leone. They have applied for a loan of 3,800,000 SLL from SMT/Kiva lenders in order to meet their immediate financial challenges. At the end of each month, they will repay their loans out of their monthly salaries. 

Mohamed is the leader of this group of borrowers. Born in Lunsar, a town in northern Sierra Leone, Mohamed is 44 years old.  He is married and has 5 children. Mohamed has been in the teaching profession for 19 years now. He has requested a loan of 800,000 SLL in order to invest it in a business. He will use it to buy rice, palm-oil, etc. for resale.

loans.use: to buy rice, palm-oil, etc., for resale

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Valentina; tiene 40 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 3 hijos ; La socia es comerciante minorista, la socia en el mes de Julio, la socia realiza banderas de la patria y las vende en la calle de forma independientes en la av. Principal y vende bien todas las dos primeras semanas, en la época navideña ella realiza manualidades como adornos navideños y muchos motivos para la época, y en cualquier otra época del año la socia realiza servicio ambulatorio en las esquinas de las calles principales llamadas a celulares a nivel nacional, ella tiene 4 celulares los cuales están cargados y ella con su distintivo verde fosforescente se para o tiene una banca de plástico y las personas se acercan a solicitar servicio de llamadas a celulares y teléfonos fijos, la socia cobra el minuto 0.50 centavos de sol. La socia en esta ocasión solicita el préstamo para invertir en la recarga de sus 4 celulares.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the San Rafael Communal Bank, which is located in the Huanchac District of Cusco Province, in the Cusco Region.

Valentina is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children.  She is a retailer.  In July, she makes national flags and sells them independently on the Avenida Principal.  She always makes good sales in the first two weeks.  During Christmas time, she makes handicrafts such as Christmas decorations and many seasonal motifs.  During the rest of the year she offers nationwide calling cell phone services on the corners of main intersections.  She has four prepaid cell phones and, dressed in her distinctive neon green,  she stands, or sometimes brings a plastic bench, and people come to her to make cell phone calls to other cell phones or to land lines.  She charges 50 cents per minute.  At the moment, she is requesting a loan to pay for minutes for her four cell phones.  

She is thankful for any help she receives and also promises to be disciplined in making her payments.

loans.use: to pay for minutes on her four cell phones

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es:
Don German trabaja en servicios de seguridad, es casado, padre de tres hijos estudiantes, su esposa labora en servicios domesticos y juntos estan apoyando a sus hijos, como lograr un mejor techo.
Don German ha trabajado en varios trabajos, pues de esta forma, ha llevado el sustendo a su casa.  el financiamiento ha sido para el, de gran oportunidad para hacer mejoras a su casa, siendo Afodenic, quien ha hecho posible un techo mejor.
Lo que desea hacer don German es poner techo en la parte donde esta la entrada del porton, como un caraje cerrado, ya que cuando llueve por estar bien cerrado el agua que cae, se le ha metido a dentro de su casa. Queriendo mejorar esta situacion.
Comprara laminas de zinc, perlines, golosos, para cerrar con techo. Mejorando esta condicion.
texts.en:
German works as a security guard.  He is married and is the father of 3 children who are in school.  His wife works as a domestic, and together they are supporting their children.  They want to make an improvement to the roof of their house.

German has had a number of different jobs through which he has supported his household.  For him, this loan is a great opportunity to make improvements to his home, because Afodenic is making it possible for him to put in a better roof.

What German wants to do is to put a roof over the entrance area near the gate so that he can enclose it like a garage, because now when it rains water gets into his house.  He wants to fix this situation.

He will buy sheets of corrugated metal, beams and screws to close off the roof and improve its condition.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal, beams and screws to enclose his garage

loans.name: Faustino Manuel

texts.es: Faustino tiene 45 años y 2 hijos que trabajan de manera independiente. El es una persona que siempre le ha gustado salir adelante. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad económica como es una farmacia. Además como padre responsable por lo que sus 2 hijos tenían que comer y estudiar, el realizo muchos sacrificios. Es por eso que solicita este financiamiento para la compra de pastillas, gotas, vitaminas, inyecciones y algodones.
texts.en: Faustino is 45 years old and has 2 children who work and are independent.  He is a person who has always liked to get ahead.  He has had a pharmacy for more than 10 years.  In addition, as a responsible father, he has made many sacrifices to feed and educate his children.  He is requesting this loan so that he can buy pills, drops, vitamins, injections and cotton wool.

loans.use: to buy pills, drops, vitamins, injections and cotton wool

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cassava, potatoes, eddoes and yams for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products for making her snacks

loans.name: Blanca Emerita

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 51 años de edad es casada y tiene 2 hijos que tienen 21 y 18 años de edad, vive con su familia en Ambato, Blanca se describe como una persona colaboradora.

Trabaja con sus hijos en la siembra y cultivo de fresas; es la primera vez que trabaja con FODEMI, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de fertilizante y para pagar a personas para la cosecha de las fresas, lo cual le ayudaróa ya que mejoraría su producción.

Su sueño es poder comprarse un vehículo para la venta de sus fresas y también sueña en tener un reservorio de agua para los tiempos de sequía.
texts.en:
Blanca is 51 years old, married, and has two children who are 21 and 18 years old.  She lives with her family in Ambato.  Blanca describes herself as someone who likes to collaborate.

She works with her children in the planting and harvesting of strawberries.  This is the first time she has worked with FODEMI.  The loan she is asking for is for the purchase of fertilizer and to pay people to pick strawberries, which will help her improve her yield.

Her dreams are to be able to buy herself a vehicle to sell her strawberries and to have a water reservoir for times of drought.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay people to pick her strawberries

loans.name: Guigo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GUIGO est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Christine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Christine est âgée de 51 ans. Christine n'a jamais été à l'école et à trois enfants dont deux restent encore à sa charge. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Christine mène comme activité la vente de maïs et d'igname de façon secondaire.Christine mène cette activité depuis cinq ans. Chritine s’approvisionne dans le plus grand marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu,Christine sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GUIGO, un cinquième crédit. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The GUIGO group is made up of three people who live in the same area of Benin. The representative of the group, named Christine, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Christine is 51 years old. Christine has never gone to school and has three children, two of whom are still her dependents. All her children are in school. 

In order to support herself and her children, Christine conducts business as a secondary seller of corn and yams. Christine has been conducting this business for five years. Christine acquires her goods at Benin's largest market. 

On a quest to satisfy her customers and increase her business and her income, Christine, together with the other members of GUIGO group, is requesting a fifth loan. The loans she received in the past have all been repaid.

loans.use: to buy corn and yams

loans.name: Maria Gladys

texts.es:
María de 42 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

María se dedica a preparar y vender comida (pollo frito con papas) en su domicilio todos los fines de semana, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años, cuenta con su propia clientela, pero a pensado en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y realizar unas mejoras en su casa para seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

María con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno se propone una meta se puede hacer realidad, con la finalidad de que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
María is 42 years old.  She lives with her husband and children in her own home, which has only electricity (no running water).  It's located in the rural area of the Tambogrande district, which is part of the Piura department.  The area has agriculture, livestock and handicrafts.

María works preparing and selling food (fried chicken with potatoes).  She does this from home every weekend, and has been doing it for several years.  She has her own customer base, but is thinking of requesting a loan of 1,500 New Soles from Edpyme Alternative to buy ingredients and make improvements to her home, so that she can continue providing her customers with good service.  With the income she will earn, she will be able to cover her loan and improve her family's living situation.

With her work and her desire to get ahead in life, María has earned the trust and respect of her neighbors, showing that when you have a goal, you can make it a reality.  Her end goal is for her children to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to continue preparing her food and to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Mariela; tiene 36 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia es psicóloga de profesión y ella alternando sus trabaja también se dedica a  la venta de productos de salud ella trabaja desde hace 4 años vendiendo productos de Herba Life; La socia realiza consultorías en diferentes instituciones, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en esta ocasión como capital de la compra de sus productos al por mayor para poder distribuirlos a sus amistades y clientes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de salud al por mayor para luego distribuirlos.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SAN RAFAEL" communal bank, which is located in the District of Huanchac, in the Province of Cusco and Department of Cusco.

The member is Mariela; she is 36 years old.  The member is married, and a psychologist by profession.  She combines her work with selling health products; she has been working for the last four years selling products from Herba Life.  The member does consultations in different institutions.

The member wants to invest this current loan as capital, and purchase products at wholesale for reselling to her friends and customers.  She is requesting the loan to invest in buying health products at wholesale for later resale.

The member is grateful for the support being offered to her, and similarly, she agrees to comply with her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying health products at wholesale for later resale.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Doña Mercedes se dedica al negocio de una pulpería desde su casa de habitación. Tiene 4 hijos los cuales 2 dependen de ella. Dio inicio a este negocio desde hace 10 años, inicio primeramente vendiendo golosinas para los niños, y poco a poco fue reinvirtiendo en su negocio de tal manera que pudiera vender granos básicos, que es lo que más compra la gente. Ella afirma que su objetivo al establecer este negocio fue buscando una fuente alternativa para brindarle manutención a sus hijos, sin embargo este negocio les ha servido muchísimo para salir adelante, ya que sus hijos pueden tener la oportunidad de estudiar. Actualmente está solicitando un este crédito para la compra de mercancías principalmente desea invertir en los granos básicos, golosinas, jugos, galletas, pan y gaseosas.
texts.en: Mercedes runs a small grocery store from her home.  She has four children, two of which are her dependents.  She started this business ten years ago, mainly selling candy for children.  Little by little, she reinvested in her business in such a way that she was able to sell staple grains, which is what people buy the most.  She asserts that her goal in starting this business was to find an alternative resource to be able to take care of her children.  Nevertheless, this business has done a great deal to help them get ahead, since her children can have the opportunity to go to school.  She is currently asking for a loan to buy merchandise.  She wants to invest mainly in basic grains, candy, juice, cookies, bread, and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, candy, juice, cookies, bread, and soft drinks

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Juana;  tiene 37 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 2 hijos; La socia es distribuidora de la empresa de salud Herba life desde hace 2 años, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y a puesto mucho empeño y trabaja para promocionar la empresa y los productos naturales de salud, la socia actualmente se encuentra promocionando una nuevo producto el cual ha tenido muy buena acogida en la sociedad así que esta vez ella requiere el préstamo para cubrir la demanda y comprar los productos al por mayor para luego de ello distribuirlos entre sus clientes y amistades. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de salud para la distribución.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SAN RAFAEL" communal bank, which is located in the District of Huanchac, in the Province of Cusco and the Department of Cusco.

The member is Juana; she is 37 years old.  The member is married with two children.  The member has been a distributor for the health business Herba Life for the last two years.  She is a very hard-working woman, and puts in much determination and hard work to promote the business and the natural health products.

Currently the member is promoting a new product which has been very well-received by society.  And so on this occasion, she is requesting the loan to cover demand and to buy products at wholesale to resell later to her customers and friends.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of health products for resale.

The member is grateful for the help that is being offered to her, and similarly she agrees to comply with her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of health products for resale.

loans.name: La Independecia De Chivarreto Group

texts.es:
La señora Catarina es soltera, tiene 25 años D. edad, es graduada D. maestra D. educación,  se dedica a impartir clases en una escuela, a la artesanía y a la crianza D. animales domestico, inició la crianza D. animales criando pollos, lleva 5 años D. experiencia en la crianza D. animales.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para solicitar un prestamos que lo utilizara para la compra D. ganado vacuno y cerdos, ya que espera agrandar su granja D. animales domésticos, las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la crianza D. animales, venta D. verduras, atención tienda D. consumo diario y al bordado D. blusas.
texts.en:
Señora Catarina is single and 25 years old.  She graduated as a teacher, and teaches at a primary school.  She also works doing handicrafts and raising domestic animals.  She began raising animals by raising chickens, and has five years of experience in raising animals.

She decided to organize a group to request a loan that will be used for the purchase of cows and pigs, as she hopes to grow her farm of domestic animals.  

The other members of the group work raising animals; selling vegetables; tending to a shop selling everyday products; and embroidering blouses.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pigs.

loans.name: Mahoude Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUDE est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Assiba Odile, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Assiba Odile est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de William. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et vivant à leur charge. Assiba Odile vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple subvient ensemble aux divers besoins de la famille. Il y a près de huit ans que Assiba Odile mène  comme activité la vente de produits cosmétiques et des mèches dans son quartier. Parallèlement à cette activité, Assiba Odile vend des chaussures, ce qui lui permet d'avoir plusieurs sources de revenus. Assiba Odile achète ses produits au Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Assiba Odile désire obtenir un autre financement, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUDE.
texts.en:
The MAHOUDE group is made up of three people who live in the same area of Benin. The representative of this group, named Assiba Odile, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. This is the third time that this group has requested financial support from ALIDé in order to raise the level of their business. 

Assiba Odile is married to a mechanic named William. The couple has three dependent children who live with them and are all in school. Assiba Odile lives together with her children and her husband. The couple works together to support their family. Assiba Odile has been conducting the business of selling cosmetic products and highlights in her neighborhood for nearly eight years. 

Alongside this business, Assiba Odile sells shoes, which allows her to have several sources of income. Assiba Odile buys her products in Benin. In order to strengthen her business and better respond to the needs of her customers, Assiba Odile would like to obtain another round of funding, together with the other members of MAHOUDE group.

loans.use: to buy highlights, cosmetics, and shoes

loans.name: Ross Mere

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Ross Mere; tiene 37 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 1 hija, la socia  compra y vende productos de primera necesidad, la socia compra al por mayor de los almacenes grandes todo los productos que se venden en las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes, la socia  compra al por mayor y los distribuye como preventista a cada una de las tiendas y bodeguitas de la ciudad, ella ya es conocida así que los clientes y dueños de las tienditas le llaman para solicitarle productos, la socia deja sus productos en dos partes,  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites en bidones, cajas de leche, mazamorras y otros.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SAN RAFAEL" communal bank, which is located in the District of Huanchac, in the Province of Cusco and the Department of Cusco.

The member is Ross Mere; she is 37 years old.  The member cohabits with her partner, and has one daughter.  The member buys and sells everyday products that she buys at wholesale at the large stores. She sells all her products to different grocery stores; she buys at wholesale and sells them to each one of the stores and small convenience stores in the city.  She is well known, and her customers and the managers of the small stores call her to request products.  She delivers her products in two parts.

The member is requesting the loan to invest in purchasing products such as rice, sugar, cans of oil, cartons of milk, porridge and other things.

The member is grateful for the help that's being offered to her, and at the same time agrees to comply with her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of products such as rice, sugar, cans of oil, cartons of milk, porridge, and other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials for weaving

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es: Raúl, natural de la ciudad de santa rosa, tiene 38 años, es un hombre alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Rebeca de 34 años y sus 03 hijos, a quienes les brinda una adecuada educación. Raúl es un hombre entusiasta de carácter amable, trabaja sus tierras con mucho ahínco para sacar adelante su producción. Él especialmente siembra cacao, café y árboles frutales, plantas originarias de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Menciona que la clave de su éxito radica en la perseverancia y las ganas de trabajar, a la vez sus plantas están trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitación y talleres de manejo de poda y control de plaga de insectos, y eso hace que su producto la mejor calidad. Raúl normalmente trabaja  por cuenta propia, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, para que de esa manera avance con mayor celeridad en la extracción y selección de su producto. Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en las cosechas y desmonte de malezas. Pero al culminar con su faena, trata de no ausentarse de las festividades costumbristas que suelen realizarse en su ciudad, por ello participa jovialmente en las conmemoraciones como se aprecia en la foto. Este será su segundo crédito y se siente muy contento de saber que contará una vez mas con el apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de seguir prosperando y esta dispuesto a devolver puntualmente sus aportes programados. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita contratará peones para que le apoyen en las cosecha y sacar la maleza de sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Raúl, who is a native of the city of Santa Rosa, is 38 years old.  He is a happy and hard-working man who lives in his own house together with his partner Rebeca, aged 34, and their three children for whom he provides an adequate education.

Raúl is an enthusiastic man with a friendly personality.  He works his lands with much effort so as to progress his production.  In particular, he grows cocoa, coffee, and fruit trees; plants that originally come from the jungle area of the Río Apurimac valley.  He mentions that the key to his success lies in his perseverance and desire to work.  All his plants are worked in in a technical manner, as he has received training in managing pruning and controlling insect infestations, and this makes his crops the best quality.

Raúl normally manages his work himself, but at harvest time he hires workers so as to be speedier in gathering and selecting his product.

With the requested loan, he will hire workers to help him with the harvest and clearing weeds.  But once work is finished he tries not to miss the traditional festivals that take place in his city.  He participates cheerfully in the celebrations, as you can see in the photo.

This will be his second loan.  He is very happy to know that he will once more get financial support, as with this he will feel secure in continuing to prosper, and he is willing to make his scheduled repayments punctually.

With the 3,000 New Soles that he his requesting, he will hire workers to help him with the harvest and clearing the weeds from his plantations.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Blanca Ines

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 52 años vive con su esposo y su hijo que tiene 18 años, viven en Ibarra; Blanca se comnsidera como una persona honrada, trabajadora y emprendedora.

Trabaja sola tejiendo sacos para la venta, es el segundo crédito que solicita a Fodemi el mismo que lo utilizará para la comnpra de lana para tejer los sacos, lo cuál le ayudaría para incrementar su producción y de la misma manera incrementar sus ingresos.

Su sueño es que su negocio crezca economicamente.
texts.en:
Blanca is 52 years old.  She lives with her husband and her 18 year-old son in Ibarra.  Blanca considers to herself to be an honest, hardworking, and enterprising person.

She works alone sewing bags to sell.  This is the second loan she is asking for from FODEMI.  She will use it to buy wool to sew her bags, which will help her increase her production and, thus, increase her income.

Her dream is to have her business grow economically.

loans.use: to buy wool to sew bags

loans.name: Madi

texts.fr:
Mr Madi. est marié et père de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 10ans et le moins âgé a 6ans. Les 02 vont à l’école et il a 04 personnes en charge.

Il vend une boutique de vêtements prêts à porter pour hommes et femmes depuis 05ans. Mr s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10.Ses clients sont les femmes, les hommes et les jeunes.

Mr veut s’acheter 20 pantalons, 15 ensembles vestes et des chaussures.

Il économise pour la scolarité de ses enfants et construire sa maison d’habition. Mr ambitionne agrandir sa boutique et s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Madi is married and a father of two. The eldest is ten and the youngest is six. They both attend school. He has a total of four people in his care.

He has been selling ready-to-wear clothing for men and women in his store for five years. Mr. Madi gets his supplies from the market in sector ten. His customers are women, men and young people.

He wants to purchase 20 pairs of pants, 15 men suits and shoes.

He is saving for his children's school expenses and to build his house. Mr. Madi's ambition is to expand his store and to take care of his family.

loans.use: to buy 20 pairs of pants, 15 men suits and shoes.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac, en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Maritza; tiene 37 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 1 hija;  La socia es una mujer muy trabajadora  y sola saca adelante a su única hija, la socia trabaja en una agencia de viajes y turismo ella está en el área de operaciones la socia en sus ratos libres  trabaja con su familia en la atención de sus tienda de abarrotes,  la socia con este ingreso logra mejorar su economía , la socia  ahora con el nuevo crédito desea invertir en la apertura de su restaurante, ella junto a sus madre pondrá su restaurante y lo seguirá administrando de manera paralela a sus trabaja. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad y de los últimos acabados para su restaurante.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “San Rafael” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco.

The member, Martiza, is 37 years old. She is single and has 1 daughter. He is a very hardworking woman and is alone in providing for her daughter. She works in a travel agency in the area of operations. In her free time she works with her family in their grocery store. With this income she is able to improve her economic situation. With this loan she wants to open a restaurant. Along with her mother, she will open her restaurant and will also continue working in her job. She requests the loan to invest in the purchase of basic products and finishing touches for her restaurant. 

Maritza is appreciative of the support that she has been provided and she also promises to make her re-payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase basic products and finishing touches for her restaurant

loans.name: Leonides

texts.es:
La señora Leonides está solicitando un préstamo para podré invertir en comprar herramienta y equipo que necesita para su local de salón de belleza.
Lo que le hace falta de herramienta es (tijeras especiales para cortar cabello, maquinas, peines, secadora de pelo y pinzas para planchar el pelo) y de quipo es (sillones espaciales y espejos). Ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para acondicionar su local. 
Doña Leonides se dedicaba a realizar trabajos de belleza a domicilio y ayudarles a sus amigas en su trabajo, pero desea ya tener su propio negocio y establecerlo en su casa y así poder atender a su pequeño hijo, que esta bajo su responsabilidad ya que es madre soltera. 
Con una parte de sus ganancias que obtiene de su negocio de salón de belleza planea pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Leonides is requesting a loan in order to buy tools and equipment she needs for her beauty salon. 

She needs tools such as special scissors for cutting hair, machines, combs, a hair dryer, and a hair flattening iron, and also equipment such as special chairs and mirrors. She does not have the money necessary to outfit her salon.

Leonides has been doing beauty work in people’s homes and helping her friends with their work. But now she wants to open her own business in her home so that she can take care of her young son. He is her responsibility because she is a single mother. 

With part of the income she will earn from her beauty salon, she will make her re-payments.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her beauty salon

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is 58 years old and lives in Barnersville, She is married and has six children between 21 to 32 years old.  They all are out of high school, and four are in college, while the other two are doing business, They all are living on their own. Marie is a high school graduate and her husband is a businessman.  

For the past thirty  years Marie has been selling oil, rice, pepper and eggplant. She  is requesting a loan to purchase more oil, rice, pepper, and eggplant for her business,  She likes the way people response to her business. She plans to build a  house and hopes to become a successful businesswoman in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more oil, rice, pepper, and eggplant

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay school fees for his children and to renovate his house

loans.name: Haydalina

texts.es: Haydalina tiene 47 años. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es la compra y venta de cerdo hace mas de  6 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella inicia este negocio  por la necesidad de trabajar ya que  no tenía un trabajo estable y decide iniciar este negocio en su vivienda y empieza con la compra de un cerdo y al tener afluencia de clientes decide invertir más en su negocio, el financiamiento es para capital e trabajo destinado para la compra de  mas  cerdos.
texts.en: Haydalina is 47 years old.  For over 6 years she has worked buying and selling pigs.  She began this business because she needed to work since she didn’t have a stable job.  She started the business from home with the purchase of one pig.  With so many customers, she has decided to invest more in the business.  The loan is for capital and labor, and is allocated to buying more pigs.

loans.use: to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy wool to weave bags.

loans.name: Sija Group

texts.es:
La señora  Julia Isabel D. 31 años D. edad, estudio los 6 años D. educación primaria, tiene dos hijo D. los cuales 1 esta estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía a la confección D. prendas, camisas, pantalones, sudadero, playeras, etc. Inició este negocio cuando tenía 25 años, y hasta el momento lleva 5 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a la construcción D. vivienda.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para compra D. una maquina D. costura industrial, ya que quiere que su negocio cuente con todas las herramientas necesarias para trabajar eficientemente, las demás integrantes se dedican a la crianza D. animales, venta D. cereales o atol y a la venta D. ropa.
texts.en:
Julia Isabel, 31, studied through 6th graD.. She has two children, one of whom is in school. She is is an artisan who makes garments, shirts, pants, sweatshirts, t-shirts, etc. She started this business when she was 25 and now has 5 years of experience. Her husband, who works in home construction, supports her. 

She decided to organize a lending group so that she could request a loan that will be used to buy an industrial sewing machine because she wants her business to have all of the necessary tools to work efficiently. The other group members raise animals, sell grains and atol [a drink maD. of corn], and sell clothing.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es:
María Eugenia integrante del Banco comunal “Amaican” perteneciente a la comuna de Pudahuel, ciudad de Santiago. Se dedica al rubro de las costuras desde hace 8 años. Comenzó cosiendo con una máquina de coser básica, en la actualidad cuenta con una máquina de coser eléctrica.
Sus costuras principalmente son productos para el hogar, entre los cuales se encuentran cojines, almohadas, manteles, pañuelines, capas para perros y esclavinas (prenda en forma de capa), para la festividad de cuasimodo (celebración religiosa católica). 
Sus materiales los compra en un barrio en la comuna de Independencia, ya que estos son a bajo costo.
Con el crédito comprará telas, hilos, cintas y flecos, para sus confecciones.
Su horario de trabajo es flexible, sin embargo solo se dedica a las costuras de lunes a viernes. 
Comenta que le va muy bien. 
Sus metas en su negocio son tener algún día una paquetería, en la cual pueda ofrecer y vender todas sus confecciones. Además le gustaría tener una máquina overlock, para realizar sus costuras. 
María Eugenia vive junto a su esposo, dos hijos de 28 y 23 años de edad, además de un sobrino de 20 años de edad que proviene de Isla de Pascua. Sus sueños a nivel familiar son que terminen sus estudios para que logren ser unos profesionales, además María Eugenia fomenta la unión familiar, comenta que la familia es lo más importante. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los créditos y servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, sobre todo por las capacitaciones, ya que le han servido para organizar su negocio. Comenta que el grupo del Banco comunal al cual pertenece es muy bueno, ya que tienen mucha tolerancia y respeto entre todos. 
Pudahuel es una comuna del sector poniente de Santiago (capital de Chile), región Metropolitana. Es un vocablo del mapudungun (lengua mapuche) que se traduce como “lugar donde se juntan las aguas” o “lugar de charcos”, debido a que posee una variada red fluvial compuesta por el río Mapocho y los esteros Lampa, Carén y Las Cruces, lo que favorece sus suelos para la producción agrícola por la existencia de abundante agua subterránea.
texts.en:
Maria Eugenia is a member of the village bank "Amaican" in the community of Pudahuel in Santiago. She has worked as a seamstress for 8 years. She began sewing with a basic sewing machine and now has an electric one. She mainly sews things for the home like cushions, pillows, tablecloths, handkerchiefs, cloaks for dogs and capes for the festival of Quasimodo (a Catholic religious celebration).  

She buys her materials in the neighborhood of Independencia where they are of lower cost. With her loan she will buy fabric, thread, tape and fringe for her creations. Her schedule is flexible, but she only works Monday to Friday. She says that it's going very well. 

Her goals for her business are to have one day have a parcel service through which she can offer and sell all of her products. She would also like to have an overlock sewing machine. 

Maria Eugenia lives with her husband and two children, ages 28 and 23, along with a nephew, 20, from Easter Island. Her dreams for her family are that they finish their studies and become professionals. She also encourages family unity and says that family is the most important thing. 

She is very happy and grateful for these loans and services from Fondo Esperanza, above all for the trainings that have helped her to organize her business. She thinks that her village bank is very good because they are very tolerant and respectful of each other. 

Pudahuel is a community in the western sector of Santiago (Chile's capital), in the metropolitan region. "Pudahuel" is a ord from mapudungun (the Mapuche language) that translates as "where the waters meet" or "place of puddles" because it has a network of rivers made up of the Mapocho river and the streams of Lampa, Carén and Las Cruces. The conditions for agriculture are favorable because of abundant subterranean water sources.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, tape and fringe for her garments.

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma Isabel es una madre de familia de 40 años, tiene 1 hijo que está a su cargo. Desde hace 8 años que tiene este negocio como es la venta de ganado y leche, Norma inicio este negocio por su padre que tenía una finca fue así que ella aprendió con este negocio y decide comenzar el propio. Ella tiene varios financiamientos y todos han sido destinados para mejorar su negocio. Actualmente ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de vacas, toros, chivos y caballos.
texts.en:
Norma Isabel is a 40 year old mother with 1 son who is dependent on her. She has had a business selling cattle and milk for 8 years. She started this business because of her father who had a farm: she learned about the business from him and then decided to begin her own. She has had several loans and all have been used to expand her business.

Currently, Norma is requesting a loan for working capital that she will use to buy cows, bulls, goats and horses.

loans.use: to buy cows, bulls, goats and horses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar tiene 37 años, es un hombre entusiasta y trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Mariluz de 31 años y sus 02 queridos hijos, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Oscar se caracteriza por ser runa persona humilde. Se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la producción y comercialización de cacao, café y árboles maderables, donde viene trabajando desde sus 20 años; recuerda que sus primeros años como agricultor no le fue tan bien, ya que los frutos de las plantas solo le alcanzaba para cubrir con los gastos de su canasta familiar, mas no para recuperar su capital. Continuó apostando por la actividad agrícola, fruto a su empeño y perseverancia tuvo su recompensa con el pasar de los años y hoy es uno de los mejores agricultores de su valle, debido a que produce productos de alta calidad, además obtiene buenos ingresos económicos. En tiempos de cosecha  y deshierbo de maleza trabaja sus tierras con jornaleros quienes lo ayudan a avanzar raudamente con sus faenas programadas. Con el crédito solicitado comprará abonos para mejorar sus sembríos. Oscar anhela en un futuro cercano adquirir más terrenos de cultivo con la necesidad de poder ampliar su producción y a la vez mejorar su condición de vida. Este será su primer crédito de Oscar con MFP y esta muy contento de saber que contará con el apoyo de los financistas para prosperar y mejorar su condición de vida. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará varios sacos de abono para mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 37 years old and is an enthusiastic and hardworking man. He lives in his own home with his partner, Mariluz, 31 and his two dear sons, who are the reason for all of his efforts. He is a humble person. He works in agriculture, specifically the production and sale of cacao, coffee and timber trees, which he has been doing since his twenties.

Oscar remembers that his first years as a farmer did not go well since the income from his crops was only enough to cover basic family expenses but not enough to build capital. He continued betting on agriculture and as a result of his effort and perseverance over the years he began to be rewarded, and today he is one of the best farmers in his valley, since he produces high quality crops and earns a good income.

During the harvest and weeding, he works his land with day laborers who help him to rapidly do the required tasks. He will buy fertilizer with the loan he is requesting in order to improve his fields.

Oscar longs in the near future to acquire more land to cultivate so he can increase his production and at the same time improve his standard of living. This will be his first loan with MFP and he is happy to know he can count on the support of lenders to help him prosper. With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will, as noted, buy bags of fertilizer to improve his crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María es una madre de familia de 39 años de edad, vive con su hija en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Túcume que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

María desde hace 5 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para realizar la compra de más animales y realizar unos arreglos a su corral, con los ingresos que adquiera por la venta puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su hija.  María es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su hija tenga lo mejor para salir adelante en la vida.
texts.en:
María is a 39-year-old mother who lives with her daughter in her own home.  She lacks basic services, and is located in the rural area of the Túcume district, in the Lambayeque department.  This region is characterized by its farming and stock raising.

For 5 years, María been raising and selling goats.  The corral is located behind her house, and both are suitable and spacious.  She gives them balanced feed and natural grasses, so that her animals enjoy optimum growth, to thus offer them in the area’s various markets, and derive earnings sufficient to cover her daily household expenses.

She has requested a 1,500-sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa, to purchase additional animals and make some repairs to their pen.  With income from her sales, she can cover the loan and improve her daughter’s standard of living.  María is a hard-working person, very reliable, and the only thing she wants is for her daughter to have the best, in order to get ahead in life.

loans.use: buy more animales and make improvements to their pen.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe tiene 60 años de edad, convive con su pareja Cirila de 48 años y fruto de ello, tienen cuatro hijos y juntos residen en la ciudad de Quimbiri, donde tienen su propia casa construida a base de material rústico adobe y techo de calamina. Felipe, aún cuando era joven trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres y a la vez trabajaba como jornalero en distintas chacras, con el transcurso del tiempo conoció a su pareja y con la necesidad de solventar los gastos de su familia compró sus propias tierras en la cual viene trabajando de manera vertiginosa. En la actualidad cuenta con 04 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de cacao, café y achiotes. Su producto con mayor demanda es el grano del café por la calidad y la aroma del producto que ofrece a los comerciantes y fruto de ello percibe buenos ingresos económicos. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos, para que de esa manera avance con mayor rapidez en la extracción y selección de su producto. Con el crédito solicitado comprará en gran cantidad estiércol y guano de isla para mejorar la calidad de sus frutos. Desea que el destino le otorgue par de años más la fuerza y el ímpetu de poder trabajar sus tierras. Este será su primer crédito de Felipe con MFP y espera beneficiarse con los créditos concedidos por parte de ustedes, para así avanzar y mejorar sus tierras de cultivo. Con el monto solicitado podrá comprar varios sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Felipe is 60 years old.  He lives with his partner Cirila who is 48 years old. They live with their 4 children in the city of Quimbiri, where they have their own house built of rustic materials and a tin roof. 

Even when Felipe was young, he worked on his parents land and at the same time he was working as a laborer on different farms. With the passage of time he met his partner and they bought their own land. With the need to pay the family expenses he has been working very hard. 

He currently has 4 hectares of planted cacao trees, coffee and achiote.  The coffee bean is the product with the highest demand because of the quality and aroma it offers to merchants and as a result he receives a good income.

Normally he works alone, but during harvest season he counts of the help of his children so that he can progress more quickly in the extraction and selection of his product.

With the loan he is requesting, he will buy a large quantity of manure and guano to improve the quality of his products. He hopes fate grant him a couple of years of strength and momentum to work their land. This will be Felipe's first loan with MFP and he hopes to benefit from the loans in order to advance and improve their farm. With the requested amount, he will be able to buy several bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Bimarck Antonio

texts.es: Bismarck Antonio se dedica a la carpintería. Tiene más de 11 años que tiene este negocio. El se encuentra muy agradecido con este medio de vida que le ha proporcionado los ingreso necesarios, tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo,  pues necesitaba obtener más ingresos para mantener a su familia. El es un hombre muy responsable que ha adquirido cierta experiencia con su negocio y sus clientes. Este crédito es para la compra de pega, clavos, madera, cepillos, serruchos, cierra entre otros.
texts.en: Bismarck Antonio is a carpenter. He has had his business for over 11 years.  He is thankful for the standard of living that his income has allowed.  He is raising three children, so it has been necessary to increase his income to support his family.  He is a very responsible man who has learned from his experience with his business and his customers.  This loan is to buy varnish, nails, wood, brushes, saws and more.

loans.use: to buy varnish, nails, wood, brushes, saws and more.

loans.name: Massan Yawa

texts.fr:
Massan  est une femme âgée de 52 ans. Elle  est mariée å un sociologue. Elle  a 5 enfants, dont tous  à l’école. Le premier a 25 ans et le dernier a 10 ans.
