Massan  travaille comme revendeuse de charbon de bois, de bois de chauffage et du gravier depuis 2008. Elle  vend du charbon de bois, de bois de chauffage et du gravier pour tout le monde à la maison.  
Massan  a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre du charbon de bois et de bois de chauffage. Elle  veut investir dans son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Massan  voudrait agrandir le marché. Elle  dit qu’avec les profits, Elle  prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Massan is a 52 years old woman. She is married to a sociologist. She has five children, who all go to school. The eldest is 25 years old and the youngest is ten.
Massan has been retailing charcoal, firewood and gravel since 2008. She sells charcoal, firewood and gravel for everyone's home usage.
Massan requested her first WAGES loan in order to buy and sell charcoal and firewood. She wants to invest in her business.
In the next few years, Massan would like to grown her market. She says that with the profit, she foresees having a happy family.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal, firewood and gravel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand his fast food stall.

loans.name: Ami Kafui

texts.fr:
Ami Kafui est une femme âgée de 30ans. Elle est célibataire.
Ami Kafui travaille comme revendeuse de portables et ses accessoires depuis 2009. Elle a une boutique et 01 personne l’aide dans l’exercice de ses activités.
Ami Kafui a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter de marchandises. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Ami Kafui voudrait prospérer dans l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit l’épanouissement de sa future famille.
texts.en:
Ami Kafui is a 30-year-old woman. She is single.
Ami Kafui has been working as a retailer of cell phones and accessories since 2009. She has a store with one person helping her with the business.
Ami Kafui requested her first loan cycle from WAGES in order to purchase merchandise. She wants to reinvest in the business.
In the coming years, Ami Kafui would like to see her business prosper. She says that with the profit, she foresees that her future family will thrive.

loans.use: to buy cell phones and cell phones accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy barbasco seeds.

loans.name: Sindy Anael

texts.es: La señora Sindy Anael  tiene 6 años de dedicarse a una pulpería. Su negocio está ubicado en su vivienda por lo que así tiene más facilidad de obtener clientes. El crecimiento de su negocio es notable gracias a la buena administración, la excelente atención a los clientes. Es una joven que ha demostrado que tiene todas las ganas de salir adelante pues siempre ha trabajado desde muy joven su Mama le enseño a ganarse la vida. El crédito lo utilizara para comprar golosinas, granos básicos, detergentes, sopas, enlatados y pan.
texts.en: Sindy Anael has been running a small grocery store for six years.  Her business is located in her home, which makes it easier to get customers.  Her business has grown noticeably thanks to good management and excellent customer service.  She is a young lady who has proven to have the drive to get ahead, as she has worked since she was very young and her mom showed her how to earn a living.  She will use the loan to buy candy, staple grains, detergents, soups, canned goods, and bread.

loans.use: to buy candy, staple grains, detergents, soups, canned goods, and bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Amah

texts.fr:
Amah est une femme âgée de 55 ans. Elle est mariée å un retraité. Elle a 01 enfant  de 19ans qui est scolarisé. 
Amah travaille comme revendeuse de bois de chauffe très utilisé chez nous au Togo depuis 2003. Elle vend à la maison.
Amah a requis son  quatrième cycle de prêt crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises. Elle veut agrandir son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Amah voudrait agrandir son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle veut subvenir aux besoins alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
Amah, age 55, is married to a retiree. She has one 19-year-old child who attended school. Since 2003, she's been working as a firewood reseller, a product very much used in Togo. She sells from her home. 

Amah is seeking her fourth loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy more supplies. In the forthcoming years, she would like expand her business. She says that with her profits, she can provide for her family's food needs.

loans.use: to buy firewood and charcoal sacks

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Felix, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, tiene 42 años de edad, vive en su propia casa al lado de su pareja Gladis de 33 años y fruto de su relación concibieron 03 hijos, por quienes vela a diario para brindarle un mejor bienestar. Félix es un hombre centrado y con muchas responsabilidades que cumplir para el bien de su ámbito familiar y  por ello se despierta  muy temprano para dirigirse a su centro de trabajo y abrir las puertas de su negocio en espera de sus primeros consumidores. Desde sus 23 años de edad viene dedicándose a la de venta de productos de primera necesidad, tales como sacos de arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes y entre otros productos y los vende la por mayor y menor. Se siente muy contento en su puesto, por que gracias a ello, compró variedad de inmuebles para su vivienda y a la vez le alcanza para solventar los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Su  puesto de ventas se sitúa en la ciudad de Quimbiri donde cuenta con la mayor concurrencia de su público. Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado, llevará acabo uno de sus metas de poder refaccionar los espacios de su bodega.  Espera contar con el apoyo financiero para poder prestar un buen servicio a sus consumidores exigentes. Este será su sexto crédito con MFP, Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo  para poder cumplir sus objetivos y por lo cual esta dispuesto en cumplir con el pago de su préstamo. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles refaccionará las fachadas de su puesto de ventas.
texts.en: Felix, native of Quimbiri, is 42 years old, owns a home next to his partner, Gladys, who is 33 years old, and together they have 3 children for whom he wakes up daily to offer a better life.  Felix is a centered man with many responsibilities to accomplish for his family. This is why he wakes up very early and goes to work to open the door for his very first customers. He has been selling groceries since he was 23 years old, such as sacs of rice, sugar, pastas, detergents, etc. and sells them at retail and wholesale prices. He is very happy in his store since he was able to buy a variety of furniture for his home and pay for his children's education. His store is located in the city of Quimbiri where he has lots of clientele.  With the requested loan, he will accomplish one of his goals of refurbishing the storage cabinets in his store. He hopes the loan will help him offer better service to his most demanding clients. This will be his sixth loan with MFP. At the moment he is requesting a small loan amount to be able to accomplish his goals and pay off the payments. With the 3,000 Peruvian Soles he will refurbish the facades of his store.

loans.use: to renovate the infrastructure of his store.

loans.name: Adame Hidou

texts.fr:
Adame Hidou est une femme  âgée de 28 ans. Elle est mariée å un électricien auto. Elle a 02 enfants dont 01 enfant à l’école. Le premier a 09 ans et le dernier a 06ans.  
Adame Hidou travaille comme revendeuse d’alimentation générale depuis 2006. Elle sert ses clients dans une boutique. 
Adame Hidou a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des produits alimentaires. Elle veut étendre son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Adame Hidou voudrait diversifier les produits. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit d’assurer les besoins primaires de la famille : santé, nourriture, éducation.
texts.en:
Adame Hidou is a 28 year old woman.She is married to an automobile electricien.She has 02 children, 01 of them attends school. The first is 9 and the second is 6.  
Adame Hidou has worked as a foodstuffs retailer since 2006.She serves her customers in a shop.
Adame Hidou has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase food products. She wants to expand her activity.
Over the next few years Adame Hidou would like to diversify her stock. She says that with the profits, she intends to provide for the primary necessities of her family: health, food, and education

loans.use: Purchase general food products.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: Claudia Patricia tiene 36 años, su actividad económica es la venta de res y cerdo. Hace más de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que sus inicios se dan porque ella es una mujer muy humilde y la responsabilidad de sus hijos contribuyeron a que ella buscara un medio de medio de ingreso para su hogar, así fue que poco a poco ella fue creciendo con esta actividad. Por lo que ahora solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo y así comprar carne y cerdos. Su deseo es que sus hijos en futuro se hagan cargo del negocio.
texts.en: Claudia Patricia is 36 years old and sells beef and pork; she has been doing this for more than 6 years.  This venture initiated because she is a humble person and being responsible for her children made her search for the means to generate an income for the household, this allowed her to steadily grow her business.  She now solicits this loan as working capital to purchase beef and pork.  Her wish is to have her children take over the business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beef and pork

loans.name: Jovita

texts.es:
La señora Jovita y el señor Salvador son padres de familia y tiene a tres hijos de mediana edad que están estudiando.
Están solicitando el préstamo para poder pagar la inscripción y comprar los útiles escolares que sus niños necesitan para empezar el siclo escolar. Ya que por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder pagar estos gastos y desea que sus hijos tengan el estudio y la educación necesaria para un futuro mejor. 
Doña Jovita es empleado de una compañía con este sueldo se encargara de pagar el crédito, ya que Don Salvador se encargara de los gastos familiares con el ingreso que recibe de su trabajo como gestor de cobranza de una funeraria.
texts.en:
Jovita and Salvador are parents of three children who are of schooling age.  They solicit this loan to be able to afford registration and school supplies that the kids need in order to start the school cycle.  At the moment they don't have the money necessary to pay these expenses and she wants her kids educated in order to have a better future.
Jovita works at a factory and with her wage she plans to pay for the loan since Salvador will be in charge of the household expenses with the income he receives working as a collections agent for a funeral home.

loans.use: to cover school supplies and registration.

loans.name: Adamou

texts.fr:
Adamou  est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Il  est marié å une ménagère. Il  a 2 enfants, dont 1 à l’école. Le premier a 5 ans et le dernier a 2 ans.  
Adamou  travaille comme mécanicien (revendeur de pneus), depuis 2006. Il  revend de pneus de voiture à tous les chauffeurs et propriétaires de voiture. Il  travaille avec  3 employés.
 Adamou  a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre des pneus de voiture. Il  veut agrandir le marché en faisant plus d’approvisionnement. 
Dans les prochaines années, Adamou  voudrait rendre l’activité durable. Il  dit qu’avec les profits, Il  prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Adamou, age 35, is married to a housewife. He has two children, age 5 and 2. One child attends school. He's been working as a mechanic (tire reseller) since 2006. He resells car tires to all car drivers and owners, and works with three employees.

Amadou is seeking his first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy and sell car tires. He wants to expand its market by purchasing more supplies. In the forthcoming years, Amadou would like to ensure the future of its business. He says that with his profits, he intends to have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy car tires

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es: Paulino, de 53 años, es un hombre trabajador y vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Fulgenia de 53 años de edad y sus 02 queridos hijos a quienes les brinda todo su apoyo. Paulino, a la edad que tiene cree que todavía le falta mucho para concretar sus planes y por ello cuenta con muchos proyectos en mente para sobre salir de la pobreza que aqueja su hogar. Uno de sus metas a largo plazo es tener un criadero de peces, actualmente solo se dedica a cultivar diversidad de plantas nativas en su parcela como: cacao, café, achiote y palillo, productos que le brindan una buena sostenibilidad económica para mejorar su condición de vida donde viene trabajando durante 25 años. Sinn embargo, Paulino necesita el apoyo de la entidad financiera para mejorar las fachadas de su vivienda y por ello acude a los préstamos, pues necesita mejorar el techo de su vivienda con calaminas nuevas, listones y vigas que le duren por un buen tiempo para así otorgarles una buena cobija a sus seres queridos. Este será su octavo crédito y por ende necesita el apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir progresando y por lo cual se compromete a devolver puntualmente sus aportes programados. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita, refaccionará  su morada y  comprará  calaminas, listones y clavos para mejorar el techo de su casa.
texts.en: Paulino is 53 years old, hard-working, and owns his own home where he lives alongside his wife Fulgenia who is 53 years old and their 2 kids whom Paulino offers his full support to.  Paulino feels that at his age he still has a ways to go before he completes his plans and he has many projects in mind to get out of the poverty that plagues his household.  One of his long-term goals is to have a fishery but currently he dedicates himself to cultivating various native plants such as: cocoa, coffee, annato and palillo ( peruvian plant similar to guava-tree), products that help him sustain economically and where he has worked for over 25 years to improve his quality of life.  However, Paulino needs the financial support in order to make home improvements and this is why he resorted to loans.  He needs to upgrade his roof with new roofing sheets, rods and beams that will last for some time so this way he can provide a roof over his loved ones.  This will be his 8th loan and he needs all of your support to continue progressing, this is why he commits to punctually make all his payments.  With the 3,000 Nuevo Soles requested he would fix his home and purchase roofing sheets, rods and beams in order to fix the roof of the home.

loans.use: To purchase roofing sheets, wood slats, and nails.

loans.name: Moyesso

texts.fr:
Moyesso est une femme âgée de 34 ans. Elle est mariée å un employé de port. Elle a 3 enfants dont 2 à l’école. Le premier a 9 ans et le dernier a 3 ans.  
Moyesso travaille comme couturière/ revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle achète et vend du maïs à tout le monde à la maison. Elle travaille seule. 
Moyesso a requis son premier crédit à  WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre du maïs. Elle veut  diversifier la marchandise. 
Dans les prochaines années, Moyesso voudrait étendre l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit assurer les besoins alimentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Moyesso is a 34 years old woman. She is married to a port employee. She has 3 children, 2 of them attend school. The oldest is 9, the youngest is 3.
Moyesso has worked as dressmaker/retailer since 2005.She buys and sells corn to her family circle. She works alone.
Moyesso has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase and sell corn. She would like to diversify her goods.
Over the next few years, Moyesso wishes to extend her activity. She says that with the profits, she intends to provide the alimentary necessities of her family.

loans.use: Buy corn.

loans.name: Warama

texts.fr:
Warama est une femme  âgée de 48 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur. Elle a 3 enfants. Le premier a 30 ans et le dernier a 18 ans.  
Warama travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1975. Elle vend des pagnes et des chaussures à tout le monde au marché. Elle achète les produits au grand marché. Elle travaille seule. Sa difficulté principale est la concurrence. 
Warama a requis son troisième crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et des chaussures. Elle veut agrandir son activité.  
Dans les prochaines années, Warama voudrait agrandir son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Warama is a 48 year old woman. She is married to a retailer. She has 3 children. The oldest is 30 and the last is 18.
Warama has worked as a retailer since 1975.She sells traditional dresses and shoes to everyone at the market. She buys her stock at the big market. She works alone. Her principal difficulty is the competition.
Warama has requested her third loan from WAGES in order to purchase dresses and shoes. She wants to extend her activity.
Over the next few years, Warama would like to expand her business. She says that with the benefits, she plans to make her family happy.

loans.use: Purchase traditional dresses and shoes.

loans.name: Sarita

texts.es: Sarita, de 26 años de edad, convive con Julián de 29 años y tienen un hijo en etapa escolar llamado Ezequiel de 05 años, y juntos residen en la localidad de Sirenachayocc donde cuentan con casa propia y lo que más desean es brindarle una comodidad a su hijo. Sarita, acentúa que todo lo que va obteniendo es a base de tenacidad y entrega a sus cultivos de cacao, café y ajonjolíes, es por ello que trata de dar el mejor cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones y bajo esa premisa es que muchos de sus compradores se han sentido satisfechos  por la calidad de sus producto agrícolas, sin embargo ella trata de esmerarse a diario y le dedica buen tiempo a sus sembrios y lo realiza conjuntamente con la ayuda de su pareja, sin embargo en tiempos de cosecha necesariamente contrata jornaleros para acelerar en la extracción de sus productos y fruto a su esfuerzo cotidiano está obteniendo buenos ingresos económicos. Sarita con el crédito solicitado comprará más plantas de cacao ya que tiene previsto injertarlos a medida que van desarrollándose. Su plan a futuro es invertir sus ingresos en otro tipo de negocios como crianza de cuyes. Este es será su primer crédito y esta muy contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero y esta dispuesta a cumplir puntualmente con el rol de sus cronogramas de pago. Con el dinero del crédito adquirirá plantas de cacao para ampliar sus sembrios y así obtener mayores ingresos posteriormente.
texts.en:
Sarita is 26 years old. She lives with her partner Julian who is 29 years old and Ezequiel, their school-aged child who is 5 years old. They live in the town of Sirenachayocc where they have their own house. What they most want is to provide their son with a comfortable environment. Sarita emphasizes that everything she obtains is through her tenacity and devotion to her cocoa, coffee and sesame crops. It is for this reason that she tries to give her crops the best possible care and under this premise many of her buyers have been satisfied by the quality of her agricultural products. Nevertheless, she strives to do her best every day and devotes a good amount of time to her crops. She does this with the help of her partner. However, at harvest time she has to hire labourers to speed up the harvesting process in their daily efforts to obtain a good income. With the requested loan, Sarita will buy more cocoa plants and hopes to graft them as they grow. Her future plan is to invest her income in other businesses such as guinea pig breeding. This will be her first loan and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support. She is willing to comply promptly with her repayment schedule. With the loan she will acquire cocoa plants to expand her crops and obtain higher revenues later.

.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants.

loans.name: Philippe

texts.fr:
Philippe est un homme âgé de 32 ans. Il est marié å une tresseuse. Il a 3 enfants, dont  2 à l’école. Le premier a 9 ans et le dernier a 3 ans.  
Philippe travaille comme couturier depuis 2004. Il coud pour  tout le monde à son atelier. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille  seul.
Philippe a requis son premier crédit à  WAGES afin d’acheter de la machine à broder pour son activité. Il veut utiliser les profits supplémentaires pour créer un nouvel atelier. 
Dans les prochaines années, Philippe voudrait agrandir son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit assurer une bonne éducation à ces enfants.
texts.en:
Philippe is a 32 year old man. He is married to a weaver. He has 3 children of whom 2 attend school. The oldest is 9 and the youngest 3.
Philippe has worked as a tailor since 2004.He sews for everyone in his workshop. He buys his products at Lomé. He works alone.
Philippe requests his first WAGES loan in order to purchase an embroidery machine for his business. He intends to use the additional profit to create a new workshop.
Over the next few years, Philippe wishes to enlarge his business. He says that with the profits, he plans to ensure a good education for his children.

loans.use: Purchase an embroidery machine

loans.name: Ninoska Isabel

texts.es:
Ninoska, de 41 años de edad, es originaria de San Carlos municipio de Rio San Juan departamento de Nicaragua pero vive en la ciudad de Granada, esta casada, madre de 2 hijos, ella es comerciante, tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa. Inicio con este negocio cuando tenía 39 años de edad,  comenzó con muy poco inventario, con el tiempo fue incrementando su mercadería poco a poco esta logra establecerla con los productos comestibles básicos que sus clientes requieren y son de consumo cotidiano. 
Ella realizo el crédito para invertir en compra de productos tales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, huevo, leche, frutas, verduras, jabones de limpieza. Esto le ayudara a mantener surtida su pulpería de mercadería que le es muy solicitada por sus clientes, quiere invertir es otros productos para variar y hacer mas clientes, poder incrementar sus ventas, mejorar sus ingresos. Una de sus metas es convertir su pequeña pulpería en una distribuidora de alimentos.
texts.en:
Ninoska is 41 years old. She is originally from San Carlos a municipality in the department of Rio San Juan in Nicaragua but lives in the city of Granada. She is married and has 2 children. She is a storekeeper and has a small grocery store at home. She started this business when she was 39 years old. She started out with very little inventory but with time she increased her merchandise little by little. She managed to establish her business with basic food products that her customers want and are used every day. 

She needed the loan to invest in the purchase of products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, milk, fruit, vegetables and cleaning soap. This will help her keep her grocery store stocked with products her customers want. She wants to invest in other products to provide variety and attract more customers, increase her sales and improve her income. One of her goals is to convert her small grocery store into a distribution centre for food.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, milk, vegetables and cleaning soap.

loans.name: Silvio Arnoldo

texts.es: Silvio Arnoldo tiene 36 años él se dedica a una farmacia en donde ofrece una gran variedad de medicamentos. Tiene más de 12 años que tiene este medio de vida. Lo inicio porque su hermana es farmacéutica y con la ayuda de ella decide establecer su negocio, pues tiene que buscar la forma de mantener a su familia. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pastillas, vitaminas, gotas, inyecciones, algodones y otros productos.
texts.en: Silvio Arnoldo is 36 and has a pharmacy where he offers a wide variety of medicines.  He has been earning a living this way for over 12 years.  He started the business because his sister is a pharmacist and with her help decided to set it up.  This was a way for him to support his family.  The loan he is requesting is to buy pills, vitamins, drops, injections, cotton and other products.

loans.use: To buy pills, vitamins, drops, injections, cotton and other products.

loans.name: La Feria Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria Angela es soltera, tiene 32 años D. edad, se dedica a la crianza D. animales, inicio este trabajo cuando era pequeña y como experiencia lleva 10 años D. tener su propio negocio, espera en el futuro tener una granja.

Por esa razón deciD. organizar un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para ampliar su capital D. trabajo en la crianza D. animales, para compra pollos D. engorD.. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza D. animales y atención atienda en general.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Angela is single, 32, and raises animals for a living.  She started this work when she was young and now has ten years experience in her own business.  She hopes to have a farm in the future.

This is why she organized a group to request a loan to increase work capital so she can buy chickens.  The other members of the group raise animals and run general stores.

loans.use: To buy chickens to raise.

loans.name: Ana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Ana de 34 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores de ésta zona se dedican a la pesca, agricultura y turismo.

Ana tiene su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace unos años aproximadamente, la misma que maneja su esposo, está actividad lo realiza en la misma zona donde vive, a pesar de la gran cantidad de personas que realizan el mismo trabajo, el trata en lo posible desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y así tenga mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi para seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Ana junto con su esposo padres responsables y trabajadores  que lo único que desean es que su hijo tengan un mejor nivel de vida al igual que estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Ana, 34, lives with her husband and son in her own house which has running water and electricity.  It is located n the urban area of the province of Chiclayo.  The locals here are involved in fishing, agriculture and tourism.

Ana has a motor-taxi business (transportation of a maximum of three people over short distances), which she has been running for a couple of years.  Her husband also works in the business which they have in the area where they live despite all the competition.  From very early in the morning he tries to attract as many passengers as possible to increase income to cover household expenses.

The loan of 1,000 PEN requested through Edpyme Alternativa will be used for maintenance of the motor-taxi for continued good service to customers.  This will improve the family's lifestyle as well.  Ana and her husband are responsible parents and hard workers who only want to provide a good lifestyle and higher education for their son.

loans.use: To pay for motor-taxi maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business

loans.name: Federico

texts.es:
Federico de 57 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pimentel que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.   Esta zona se dedica a la pesca, agricultura y ganadería.

Federico desde hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (aves y cerdos), su corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un óptimo crecimiento para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de más animales y su respectiva comida, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Federico es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia para que logren su objetivo propuesto.
texts.en:
Federico, 57, lives with is family in their own house which has running water and electricity.  It is located in the rural area of the district of Pimentel which belongs to the Chiclayo Province.  This area is known for its fishing, agriculture and livestock farming.

For many years Federico has been raising and selling chickens and pigs.  His ample barnyard is located behind his house.  He gives the animals balanced feed and natural grains for their proper development.  He then sells them at the different markets in the area where he obtains a good profit to cover his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan in the amount of 3,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and feed.  He will use the earnings from sales to cover the loan and improve his lifestyle.  Federico is a person who has worked very hard to help his family get ahead and meet the goals he has set for himself.

loans.use: To buy animals and feed.

loans.name: Las Milagrosas 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
R. is the coordinator of her group Las Milagrosas 2 & 3 (the miraculous women). Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo and is composed of ten businesspeople. 

R. lives in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their two children. She says that her biggest challenge is to continue living a Christian life according to the gospel. This is her second loan with Esperanza Internacional. 

R. has had her business for more than two years. She buys planting pots and  paints them, then sells them painted and decorated. Most of her clients buy them to plant flowers. After she had started this a friend told her about selling ice cream; she then bought a freezer and four ice cream buckets of different flavors. Now she is selling both painted pots and ice cream. She will use this loan to purchase one dozen pot sets and four buckets of ice cream. 

She will use her business profits to buy her children school supplies, because the school season is coming. After this she will be able to save the profits and reinvest the rest in her business. 

She enjoys being with her family and painting. She dreams of having her own house; this is one of the reasons she is saving and taking the loans to invest in her business activities.

loans.use: to buy planting pots and ice cream buckets

loans.name: Luz Maribel

texts.es:
La señora Luz,tiene 21 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y con su pequeño hijo. Ella posee una tienda donde vende frijoles, azucar, arroz, maiz, entre otros productos de primera necesidad.

su madre fue quien le enseño esta activadad y hoy en dia ya tiene 3 años desarrollando esta actividad, la cual le proporciona los ingresos necesarios para ayudar a su compañero de vida con los gastos del hogar.

La señora Luz esta solicitando un prestamo a la Fundacion campo, para poder tener mayor cantidad de los productos que mas vende en su tienda. Actualmente ella tiene que viajar aproximadamente 15 kilometros en bus,para adquirir sus insumos, por lo que debe salir muy temprano de su casa.

En un futuro a la señora Luz, le gustaria adquirir su propia casa y seguir dandole el estudio a su hijo para que sea alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Luz, 21, lives with her life partner and their young son.  She has a store where she sells beans, sugar, rice and corn among other staples.

Her mother taught her this activity and as of today she’s been doing it for three years.  It provides the necessary income for her to be able to help her life partner to meet household expenses.

Luz is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to have larger amounts of products to sell in her store.  She currently has to travel about 15 kilometers by bus to acquire her supplies so she has to leave home very early.

In the future, Luz would like to acquire a house of her own and continue providing her son with an education so that he can become someone in life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and sugar, among other products, to sell in her store.

loans.name: Meylin Del Socorro

texts.es:
Meylin, originaria de la ciudad de Granada, es madre de 4 hijos de edades promedio de 5, 12, 8 y 14 años de edad respectivamente todos están en la escuela. Ella es comerciante, tiene una pulpería en su casa. Empezó con este negocio a los 27 años de edad con una inversión de $ 300 dólares poco a poco fue creciendo su negocio , hasta lograr establecer bien su pulpería, ella dice que es un buen negocio que genera ingresos pequeños pero que con esmero y dedicación se puede lograr hacerlo crecer mas. 
Solicito el préstamo para reparar estantes, componer el freezer e invertir en compra de granos básicos, productos de limpieza, vegetales, frutas, gaseosas, jugos. Esta inversión le ayudara a reparar parte de los activos fijos de su pulpería en invertir en su negocio. En lo futuro quiere poner una distribuidora de productos varios y de uso cotidiano.
texts.en:
Meylin, originally from the city of Granada, is the mother of four children, ages 5, 8, 12 and 14, who are all in school.  She is a merchant and runs a grocery store out of her house.  She started the business 27 years ago with an investment of $300.  Little by little it has grown into a stable activity even though she says the income comes in small amounts.  But with effort and dedication she can make it grow more.

She is requesting a loan to repair shelves and the freezer, and to buy basic grains, cleaning products, vegetable, fruit, softdrinks and juice.  This investment will help her repair some of the fixed assets in her business.  In the future she would like to be a distributor of daily use products.

loans.use: To repair shelves and the freezer, and buy basic grains, cleaning products, vegetables, fruit, softdrinks and juices.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy items for her stationary's shop such as notebooks, pens and paper.

loans.name: Lily Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Lily de 45 años, habita en la ciudad de León, es comerciante, madre de tres hijos. Nos cuenta que su experiencia vivida con el primer préstamo Kiva fue muy positiva para ella, todo  lo invirtió en compra de ropa y mercadería en general   la ayudo a solventar parte de los gastos que tenia también he hizo mas clientes, es por tal motivo que solicita este préstamo para invertir en comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería en general como ropa, zapatos. Ella quiere ampliar su clientela ofrecer su productos por otras zonas de Leo, es por ello que en lo futuro quiere alquilar un local para vender su mercadería.
texts.en: Lily is 45 years old, she lives in León, she has three children and she is a retailer. She told us that she lived a very positive experience with her first Kiva loan: she invested it all to buy clothes and general merchandise. The loan helped her partly pay for her expenses, as well as helping her gaining more customers. This is why she is requesting a loan she will invest in the purchase of a higher quantity of various products such has clothes and shoes. She wants to increase the number of her customers and to offer her products ion other areas of the town of León, and in the future she wants to rent a shop unit where to sell her products.

loans.use: To buy a higher quantity of various products such has clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, charcoal, and soft drinks for her business

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.es:
Bernardita integra el Banco comunal “Amaican” perteneciente a la comuna de Pudahuel, ciudad de Santiago. Ella se dedica al rubro de los servicios específicamente peluquería, desde hace 30 años. Bernardita comenzó como ayudante en un salón de belleza y desde hace 11 años se independizó como trabajadora, por lo que ahora cuenta con un local, el cual arrienda, está ubicado a 15 minutos de su casa. Comenta que le va muy bien, a pesar de la competencia dentro del sector donde vive.  
Sus horarios de trabajo son todos los días de la semana, desde las 11ºº horas de la mañana, hasta las 21ºº horas de la noche, el único día libre o de descanso es el día lunes. 
Sus insumos los,  compra en locales comerciales y distribuidoras dedicadas solo a la venta de productos cosmetológicos y para el cabello. 
Con el crédito comprará un vaporizador (uso post masajes y tinturas para el cabello) y una esculpidora (tijera para entresacar el cabello).
Sus metas en su negocio son ampliar y remodelar su peluquería, además comprar nuevos productos para realizar más servicios, como el de depilación (cama y olla para depilación).
Bernardita vive junto a su hijo de 19 años de edad, quien estudia la carrera de laborista dental. Sus sueños a nivel personal son adquirir su vivienda propia, para esto postuló al subsidio habitacional por lo que además integra un comité de vivienda. 
Fondo esperanza ha significado una gran ayuda para su negocio, especialmente al momento de invertir en nuevos productos, que no podría costear sola. Es por esto que Bernardita se encuentra muy agradecida de los servicios otorgados por la institución. 
Las relaciones interpersonales al interior del grupo del Banco comunal, son muy buenas, ya que existe respeto, compromiso y confianza. 
Pudahuel es una comuna del sector poniente de Santiago (capital de Chile), región Metropolitana. Es un vocablo del mapudungun (lengua mapuche) que se traduce como “lugar donde se juntan las aguas” o “lugar de charcos”, debido a que posee una variada red fluvial compuesta por el río Mapocho y los esteros Lampa, Carén y Las Cruces, lo que favorece sus suelos para la producción agrícola por la existencia de abundante agua subterránea.
texts.en:
Bernardita is a member of the Communal Bank "Amaican", which is located in the community of Pudahuel in Santiago city.  She has been working providing services, specifically hair-dressing, for the last 30 years.  Bernardita started as an assistant in a beauty salon, and then 11 years ago become independent.  She now has her own premises, which are leased and located 15 minutes from her home.  She comments that it is going very well for her, in spite of the competition in the area where she lives.

Her work schedule is every day of the week, from 11 in the morning until 11 at night.  Her only days off are Mondays.  She purchases her supplies from commercial premises and distributors who solely sell cosmetology and hair products.

With the loan, she will purchase a vaporizer (for use after massages and hair coloring), and sculpting scissors (scissors for thinning out the hair).

Her goals for her business are to expand and remodel her hair salon.  Additionally, she would like to buy new products to introduce more services, such as waxing (a bed and wax melter).

Bernardita lives with her 19-year-old son, who is studying for a degree as a dental technician.  Her dreams on a personal level are to acquire her own home; she has applied for a housing subsidy, as she is also a member of a housing committee.

Fondo Esperanza has been a great help for her business, especially when needing to invest in new products that she would not be able to afford on her own.  This is why Bernadita is very grateful for the services offered by the institution.

The interpersonal relationships between the group of the Communal Bank are very good, as they have respect, commitment and trust.

Pudahuel is a community in the western part of Santiago (the capital of Chile), in the metropolitan region.  The name is from Mapundungun (the Mapuche language), and translates as "the place where the waters meet", or "the place of the pools", due to its wide river network composed of the Mapocho river and the Lampa, Carén and Las Cruces estuaries.  This favors the soil for agricultural production due to the existence of abundant water underground.

loans.use: to purchase a vaporizer (for use after massages and hair coloring), and sculpting scissors (scissors for thinning out the hair)

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel Jesús tiene 74 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa. Hace más de 12 años que tiene este negocio, ya que gracias al esfuerzo que realiza para sobrellevar los gastos de su vivienda. Ella inicio este negocio de manera ambulante fue con el paso del tiempo que ha logrado seguir con él. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes entre ootros.
texts.en: Manuel Jesús is 74 years old and his business is selling clothes.  He has been in this business for more than 12 years.  He works hard to cover his household expenses.  Manuel started out making his sales as an itinerant street vendor and has managed to continue in his business over time.  The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, etc.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Araceli Del Carmen

texts.es: Araceli del Carmen tiene 40 años, su actividad es la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este medio de vida. Ella sale a vender todos los días para ofrecer la variedad de productos que tiene como es pintura de labios, pintura de uñas, cremas, tratamientos, shampoo entre otros. Araceli tiene como mayor desafío el brindarle a sus  clientes lo que le soliciten. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en: Araceli del Carmen is 40 years old and her business is selling cosmetics.  She has been in this line of work for more than five years.  She goes out every day to sell her range of products which includes lipsticks, nail polish, creams, treatments and shampoos.  Araceli's biggest challenge is providing her customers with what they ask for.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy supplies.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks, nail polish, creams, treatments, shampoos, etc.

loans.name: Darlin Yanet

texts.es: Darlin Yanet tiene su negocio que es una pulpería. Hace más de 6 años que tiene esta actividad. Inicio con fondos propios ya que no tenia los suficientes ingresos para mantener a su familia, sus hijos están a su cargo todos los días ella se levanta temprano para empezar a atender a sus clientes. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosina, refrescos, pan galletas y grano básicos.
texts.en: Darlin Yanet owns a grocery store business.  She has been in this business for more than six years.  She started out with her own funds as she didn't have enough income to support her family (her children are in her care).  Every day she gets up early to start serving her customers.  The loan that she is requesting is for buying candies, soft drinks, bread, cookies and basic grains.

loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, cookies and basic grains

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 28 años es soltera y tiene una hija de 5 años, vive en Ibarra junto con su padre y su hija. Rosa se describe como una persona alegre, sencilla y tranquila.

Trabaja con su padre en una panadería. Es la primera vez que trabaja con FODEMi y el crédito es para la compra de harina, manteca, huevos, mantequilla para incremnentar la produccción de pan y así poder mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos.

Sus sueños es tener un local amplio para su panadería ya que en el actual forma parte de su vivienda y no tiene mucho espacio, también necesita comprar un carro para distribuir su pan ya que en la actualidad el carro que utilizan es muy antiguo; y en cuanto a lo personal quiere comprar un terreno para construir su propia casita.
texts.en:
Rosa is 28 years old, single, and has a 5-year-old daughter.  She lives in Ibarra together with her father and her daughter.  Rosa describes herself as a cheerful, unassuming and calm person.

Rosa works with her father in a bakery.  This is the first time that she has worked with FODEMI and she will use her loan to buy flour, lard, eggs and butter to increase her bread production and thereby improve her sales and increase her income.

Rosa's dream is to have bigger premises for her bakery since it currently forms part of her home and she doesn't have a lot of space.  She also needs to buy a car so that she can deliver her bread since the car that they are currently using is very old.  As regards her personal dreams, she would like to buy a plot of land so that she can build a little house of her own.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard, butter and eggs

loans.name: Nuevo Progreso 1 Group

texts.en:
Sonia is the coordinator of her group, Nuevo Progreso 1 (New Progress). This is a group composed of five businesswomen. All of them are working to improve their own lives and the lives of their families, as they are living in one of the poorest areas around Santo Domingo city. 

Sonia makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their four children. She is excited to be seeking her first loan with Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying household products. She has been selling these products for almost a year, starting after one of her neighbors give her some products to sell. Then, after she was able to save some money, she started selling by herself. She will buy three boxes of household products of different types.

She will save her profits to finish building her house. Her most difficult challenge is to get married in the church. She likes to sing and wants to become a professional. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy household products for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy craft materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and sugar, oil and canned goods

loans.name: Lissete Maria

texts.es: Lissette Maria de 34 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos.  Ella tiene 2 hijos con los que sueña ver prósperos y productivos y por eso se esmera por lograr una educación de calidad y es precisamente su mayor motivación en el trabajo que desempeña como comerciante. Ella inició su negocio con capital propio, pues con ciertos ahorros que tenía decide comenzar a comprar ciertos productos para empezar a ofrecer a todo público en general. Este crédito es para la compra de  cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, lápiz labial, brillos, lápiz de ojos entre otras.
texts.en: 34-year-old Lissette Maria sells cosmetics.  She has two children who she dreams of seeing do well and becoming productive.  For this reason, she takes care to ensure they have a good education.  This is her main motivation in the work that she carries out as a saleswoman.  Lissette started her business with her own capital.  With some savings that she had, she decided to start buying certain products so that she could start selling them to the general public.  This loan will be used to buy creams, treatments, shampoos, lipsticks, nail polish, eye pencils and other products.

loans.use: to buy creams, treatments, shampoos, lipsticks, nail polish, eye pencils, etc.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan: de 55 años de edad el tiene su venta de refacciones, el se dedica a esta actividad desde  hace varios años,el nos cuenta que esta contento porque le a ido bien en su negocio, desde que inicio su negocio a umentado su clientela y tiene la ilucion de poder crecer un poco mas por momento tiene a personas que le ayudan en la elavoracion de refacciones,ahora el esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la elavoracion de refacciones ya que sus ventas han aumentado y nececita mas capital para trabajar,el sueño de el es tener otro local y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 55 years old and has a business selling snacks.  He has been in this business for several years.  He tells us that he is happy because his business has done well.  Since he opened his business his number of customers has increased and he hopes to be able to grow the business further.  He currently has people who help him make his snacks.

Juan is requesting this loan to buy food products with which to make his snacks as his sales have increased and he needs more capital with which to work.  His dream is to have another sales location and to help his family.

loans.use: to buy food products for making snacks

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es: Fortunato de 37 años, convive con julia de 35 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 02 hijos y viven en su propia casa donde reina la comprensión. Fortunato es una persona muy trabajora, quien viene realizando las actividades de compra y venta de productos de la zona; tales como: cacao, café, achiote y palillo, esta actividad lo realiza   junto a su  amada pareja Julia quien se encarga de pesar los volúmenes de cada producto. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es contar con la plena confianza de los agricultores, quienes al ver el buen trato y precio que se les brinda no dudan en entregarle la mayor cantidad de sus frutos. Fortunato viene realizando esta actividad hace 05 años, con mucho entusiasmo y laboriosidad, ya que vio en ello una gran oportunidad de generar su propio ingreso para el mejor bienestar de su entorno familiar, además de brindarles una buena educación y alimentación adecuada.  Los planes  que tiene en mente es la de seguir creciendo y trabajar con el mismo ímpetu. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo cual se compromete a aportar sus pagos en la fecha in todos ustedes. Los 3,000 soles que solicita le servirá como capital para comprar más frutos de los agricultores.
texts.en:
37-year-old Fortunato lives with 35-year-old Julia and the couple have two children.  They live in their own home where understanding reigns.  Fortunato is a very hard-working person whose business is buying and selling products from his area such as cacao, coffee, annatto and turmeric.  He carries out this work together with his beloved partner Julia whose job is to weigh the volume of each product.

What Fortunato most enjoys about his work is having the full trust of the farmers who, seeing the way he treats them and the good price he offers, don't hesitate to give him the largest quantity of their fruit.  Fortunato has been in this business for five years.  He works with a lot of enthusiasm and effort as he sees it as a great opportunity to make his own income in order to improve the well-being of his family, providing them with a good education and decent food.  Fortunato's plans are to continue growing and working with the same energy.

This is Fortunato's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments to each of you on time.  He will use the 3,000 soles that he has requested as capital with which to buy more fruit from the farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fruit

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es:
Marcos Antonio	
tiene su panadería Emanuel que donde amablemente su propietario don Marcos  Antonio desde muy temprano junto a sus trabajadores trabajan elaborando panes para servir a sus clientelas de su comunidad y las que le rodean, el nos comenta que desde muy pequeño el trabajaba en esto al lado de su papa, hace 10 años el decidió viajar al norte para buscar una mejor oportunidad el dice que no fue nada fácil estar aya porque dejo a su esposa y a sus hijos solos pero por amor a ellos el trabajo duro ahora ya hace 3 años que se encuentra en Guatemala y esta satisfecho porque se esfuerzo le ha recompensado pero que con su propia panadería y su anhelo es seguir creciendo y su mayor anhelo es que sus cuatro hijos se gradúen y hacer crecer mas el negocio hoy necesita el crédito para compra de arina para elavorar pan ya que su negocio se lo esta pidiendo
texts.en: Marcos Antonio	owns the Emanuel bakery.  From very early in the morning, he and his workers make bread to serve to customers in their community and also in surrounding communities.  Marcos Antonio tells us that he worked in this business from a very young age alongside his dad.  Ten years ago, he decided to travel to the north in search of better opportunities.  He said that it wasn't easy at all being there because he had to leave his wife and children behind but, because of his love for them, he worked hard there.  He has now been in Guatemala for three years and and is happy because his hard work has paid off.  He has his own bakery and his wish is to continue growing his business.  His biggest wish, however, is for his four children to graduate.  Marcos Antonio needs this loan to buy flour with which to make bread as his business requires it.

loans.use: to buy flour for making bread

loans.name: Fabiola Maria

texts.es:
Fabiola tiene 55 años vive con su esposo en Ibarra, tiene 4 hijos los cuales tienen 38, 36, 29 y 28 años de edad. fabiola se describe como una persona amable con todas las personas y risueña deacuerdo a la persona con quien esté.

Empezó a trabajar con su esposo hace 30 años en la elaboración de pan de dulce y sal. Trabaja con FODEMI desde el año 2009 y el crédito que solicita actualmente es para la compra de 15 quintales de harina y dos bloques de manteca lo cual le ayudaría a producir más pan y mejorar sus ventas.

Su sueño es mejorar la tecnología de sus hornos y todas sus herramientas de la panadería y también ayudar a sus hijos para que sean emprendedores y puedan tener su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Fabiola is 55 years old and lives with her husband in Ibarra.  She has four children who are 38, 36, 29 and 28 years old.  Fabiola describes herself as somebody who is kind to everybody and smiles at whoever she is with.

Fabiola started working with her husband 30 years ago making sweet and savory bread.  She has been working with FODEMI since 2009 and the loan that she is currently requesting is for buying fifteen 100lb bags of flour and two blocks of butter which will help her to produce more bread and improve her sales.

Fabiola's dream is to improve the technology of her ovens and all the equipment in her bakery.  She also wants to help her children become entrepreneurs and own their own businesses.

loans.use: to buy fifteen 100lb bags of flour and two blocks of butter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Martha Rosa

texts.es:
Doña Martha es comerciante, se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, compra cerdo pequeños el cual, los compra  a menor costo engorda y destaza sacando buenas ganancias. Tambien vende en un carrito ambulante, enchiladas, tacos, vigoron, hamburguesa, hotdog y los fines de semana hace sopas.
Pues es una mujer que le gusta mover su dinero ya que tiene compromisos de pago, a si como el apoyo  a sus tres hijos, su esposo es comerciantee.
Martha ha trabajado en cinco ciclos con financiamientos en Afodenic, en donde ha logrado aumentar sus ventas al comprar mas cerdos y productos para su venta. Con este nuevo prestamo comprara: cuatro cerdos para destace, logrando aumentar las ventas y cubrir la demanda de sus cliente. Haciendose posible por este medio.
texts.en: Martha is a saleswoman who buys and sells pigs. She buys pigs when they are young and cost less then fattens them and slaughters them. This makes her good profits. She also sells enchiladas, tacos, vigorón, hamburgers and hotdogs from a mobile street cart. On weekends she makes soups. Martha has been working with loans from Afodenic for five loan cycles. She has managed to increase her sales buy purchasing more pigs and products to sell. She will use this new loan to buy four pigs to slaughter. This will enable her to increase her sales and meet her customer demand.

loans.use: to invest in buying four pigs to slaughter

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee, de 30 años de edad, convive con Juan de 30 años y fruto de esa relación tienen una hija llamada Karina de 04 años y juntos residen en su propia casa situada en la ciudad de Santa Rosa. Aydee, aún cuando era adolescente trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres y a la vez trabajaba como jornalera en distintas chacras. Con sus ahorros acumulados compró su propia parcela, desde entocnes trabaja sobre esas tierras durante casi 05 años y cuenta con 03 hectáreas de terreno en donde cultiva plantas de cacao y café. La clave de su éxito radica en la creatividad y las ganas de trabajar, sus plantas están trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitación de los Ingenieros Agrónomos periódicamente. Su producto con mayor demanda es el grano del café por la calidad del producto que los ofrece y fruto de ello percibe buenos réditos económicos. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, para que de esa manera avance con mayor celeridad en la extracción y selección de su producto. Su plan a futuro es seguir ampliando su producción agrícola para que de esa manera pueda seguir satisfaciendo a sus clientes, en efecto mejorar su condición de vida. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que el dinero del crédito le será de mucha utilidad en el progreso de su trabajo, por ello agradece una vez mas a todos ustedes por el apoyo. Con los 2,000 soles que solicita, contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en las cosecha y desmonte de maleza.
texts.en:
30-year-old Aydee lives with 30-year-old Juan and the couple have one daughter called Karina who is 4 years old.  They live together in their own home which is located in the town of Santa Rosa.

Even when she was a teenager, Aydee worked on her parents' land and also worked as a laborer on different farms.  With some savings that she had made, she bought her own plot of land and she has been working on this land for almost five years.  She has 3 hectares of land where she grows cacao and coffee.  The key to her success lies in her creativity and her desire to work.  She applies modern technology to her work with her plants because she receives periodic training from agricultural engineers.  Her most sought-after product is coffee beans because of the quality of the product that she sells.  As a result, she makes good money.  She normally works alone but at harvest times she hires laborers so that she can pick and sort her crops more quickly.  Aydee's future plan is to continue expanding her production so that she can continue satisfying her customers and improving her own living conditions.

This will be Aydee's second loan from MFP.  She knows that the loan money will be very useful to her in making progress in her work.  For this reason, she is once again very grateful to you all for your support.  Aydee will use the 2,000 soles that she has requested to hire laborers to support her in her harvest and in weeding her land.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Solidario Elim Group

texts.es:
DUO ELIM
Este grupo esta formado por doña lidia del Rosario D. 29 años D. edad, casada ella tiene 2 hijos es la lider del dup se dedica a la venta D. ropa típica nueva y usada desD. hace 10 años,  ella nos cuenta  que también venD. tacos mexicanos los fines D. semana, allí en su casa y la ropa sale a venderla en una comunidad cercana  San Raymundo,ella llebva varios años D. dedicarse a esta activiada y esta solicitando este ceredito para la compra D. ropa tipica doña Marta Olivia D. 26 años D. edad casada y tiene 1 hija, y se dedica a la venta D. ropa típica nueva y también costura, también venD. papas y pollo frito los fines D. semana en la comunidad donD. vive tiene su negocio desD. hace 10 años, y nos cuenta que venD. Ambulante y  en la casa D. su mama , ella solicita este crédito porque necesita comprar ropa para poder tener  capital y en el mes D. septiembre venD. blusas blancas y trajes completos por la fiesta D. independencia le encargan ropa D. uniformes, y dice que la ropa típica es muy cara, y para comprarla en ese mes ya no se encuentra por eso desD. ahora quiere almacenar y tenerla para cuando se la vayan a pedir confía  en que Fape la apoyara como lo hace con otras señoras ellas esperan no defraudar a la institución sino cumplir con todo.
texts.en:
Elim Duo

Lidia Rosario, age 29, is married and has two children.  She is the leader of the duo.  She has been selling new and used typical clothing for ten years.  She tells us that she also sells Mexican tacos at her house on the week-ends.  She sells the typical clothing in a nearby community, Raymundo.  She has been doing this for several years.  She is requesting this loan to buy typical clothing.

Marta Olivia, age 26, is married and has one daughter.  She sells new typical clothing, and she also makes clothes.  Additionally, she sells potatoes and fried chicken on the week-ends in the community where she lives and has had her business for ten years.  She tells us that she sells in an itinerant manner and at her mother’s house. 

 She is requesting this loan because she needs to buy clothes to be able to have capital.  In the month of September she sells white blouses and complete outfits for the festival of independence.  She receives orders for uniforms.  She says that typical clothing is very expensive to buy in September because it is hard to find.  Therefore, she wants to store it and have it when she receives orders.  

She believes in FAPE.  It supports her like it does with other women.  They do not wish to disappoint the institution, they would rather meet all of their obligations.

loans.use: to buy typical clothing to sell.

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.es: Celedonia es socia del Banco Comunal Los Laureles, tiene 51 años y 6 hijos, dos de ellos todavía estan a su cargo. Celedonia tiene un Bar- Restaurante, ella esta en Finca desde sus inicios, le invitó Morenita y Wiracocha (ambos fundadores de FINCA Peru), cuando ella ingresó sólo habían 2 bancos: Abejitas y Esperanza, y ella pertenecía a Abejitas, recuerda con mucha nostalgia a ella le dieron 50 soles y cada semana tenia que llevar 5 soles, agradece mucho a Finca ya que no solo tiene su Restaurante sino también tiene una Stand en un Centro Comercial, tambien tiene 2 taxis que los hace trabajar, ella creció junto con Finca agradece todo lo que tiene ya que le ayudaron a poder ser mas perseverante y responsable, en sus negocios y con sus pagos, le encanta el ahorro, ahora su meta es poder terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en: Celedonia is a member of the "Los Laureles" ("The Laurels") community bank. She is 51 years old and has 6 children, two of whom are still dependent on her. Celedonia owns a cafe/restaurant. She has been with FINCA since the very beginning. Morenita and Wiracocha, both founders of FINCA Peru, invited her to join. When she did there were only two communal banks: "Abejitas" ("Little Bees") and "Esperanza" ("Hope"). She fondly remembers that she was given 50 soles and that she had to pay back 5 soles every week. She is very grateful to FINCA because now she not only has her restaurant but also space in a shopping centre. She also owns two cabs that work for her. She has grown alongside FINCA and she is grateful for everything she has, because they helped her to become more persistent and responsible in her business and payments. She enjoys saving and her goal now is to finish building her home.

loans.use: to stock up on products for her restaurant.

loans.name: Solidaridad De Tecoac Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Solidaridad D. Tecoac", esta ubicada en el Estado D. Mexico. Esta conformado por 10 integrantes y es L. septima vez que solicitan un prestamo. Isabel es L. tesorera del grupo. ElL. tiene 33 años, estudio hasta L. secundaria, se dedica a L. costura D. ropa, tiene en total 4 hijos; 2 hijas y 2 varones. ElL. tiene un pequeño taller D. costura, se dedica a reparar prendas D. vestir, tales como: pantalones, cierres, sueter, camisas y hace vesturiarios para festivales en las escuelas. Este negocio lo inicio hace 8 años aproximadamente.  Solicita el prestamo para comprar hilos, telas y refacciones para L. maquina que tiene. Con esto espera obtener mayor ingresos para su familia, ademas elL. anheL. con las ganancias que obtenga y sus ahorros comprar otra maquina para poder tener a alguien que L. apoye cuando tenga bastante trabajo y pedidos. Al momento D. solicitar el prestamo elL. se siente feliz porque cuenta con L. oportunidad D. poder invertirlo en su negocio.
texts.en: This group is called "Solidaridad D. Tecoac". It is located in the state of Mexico. It is maD. up of 10 members and this is the seventh time they have asked for a loan. Isabel is the group's treasurer. She is 33, went to high school, and sews clothing. She has 4 children, 2 daughters and 2 sons. She has a small sewing shop, and she repairs clothing such as: pants, zippers, sweaters, and shirts. She also makes costumes for school festivals. She started this business about 8 years ago. She is asking for the loan to buy thread, fabric and replacement parts for her sewing machine. With this, she hopes to have more income for her family. She also wants to buy another machine with her income and savings in order to have someone help her when there is a lot of work and orders. At this time, while asking for this loan, she is happy because she has the chance to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric and replacement parts for her sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale to make clothing.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es: Paulino, natural de la ciudad de San Francisco, tiene 32 años de edad, es un joven soltero y sobre todo muy entusiasta en sus labores, vive en la casa de sus padres y se esmera a diario para entregar lo mejor a su futura familia. Paulino se esmera en trabajar arduamente sus campos de cultivo donde siembra variedad de plantas tropicales como: cacao, café, y frutas de piña, los cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos no dudan en ir al encuentro para comprarle todos sus frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir la plaga de insectos que se apoderan de los brotes de los frutos, es por ello que tiene que combatirlos de manera natural colocando trampas y cortinas para no dañar el medio ambiente. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este es será su sexto crédito con MFP y  ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos anteriores y espera beneficiarse una vez más con el crédito y de ante mano agradece a todos ustedes por concederle el préstamos. Los 3,000 soles que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para mejorar la calidad de sus tierras y sembrios.
texts.en:
Paulino is originally from the city of San Francisco. He is 32 years old, single and very enthusiastic in his work. He lives at his parents' home and works hard to provide for his future family. Paulino works hard in his farm, where he grows different tropical plants such as cocoa, coffee and pinaple fruit. After the harvest he sells them in San Francisco, where he already knows several buyers. They know of the quality of his products and don't hesitate to meet him and buy all of his products. 

What he enjoys the most about his work is sowing the fields and making them fertile and productive. He has been in this line of business for 5 years and thinks that the main difficulty is fighting the insect plagues in the fruit. He fights them naturally, using traps and nets to avoid damaging the environment. 

In the future he hopes to continue to save money because he would like to buy more land. This will be his sixth loan with MFP and he has paid back previous loans on time. He hopes to benefit once more from the loan and is very grateful in advance to everyone providing him with a loan. He will invest the 3,000 soles requested in the purchase of manure and fertilizers to improve the quality of his land and crops.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in buying materials for his shoe shop. He will buy soles, glue, nylon thread and heels, among other things for his workload.

loans.name: Carlos Javier

texts.es: Carlos es socio del Bancomunal Los Laureles, tiene 39 años, se dedica a la venta de zapatos y a la fábricación de zapatos para caballero, tiene 3 hijos. Es socio de FINCA Peru desde hace dos años, él siempre trabajó haciendo zapatos porque es un negocio familiar, agradece mucho por todo lo que le han enseñado, a traves de las capacitaciones ha aprendido a ser mas responsable en todos aspectos, las capacitaciones le gustan porque ha aprendido mucho sobre los valores lo cual inculca en su hogar, ahora su mayor deseo es poder ampliar su negocio y poder tener una sucursal.
texts.en: Carlos is a member of the communal bank Bancomunal Los Laureles. He is 39 years and has 3 children. He sells shoes and makes shoes for men. He has always worked making shoes because it is a family business. He has been a member of FINCA Peru for 2 years. He appreciates everything they have taught him. Through the training he has learned to be more responsible in all respects. He likes the training sessions because he has learned alot about values which he instills into his home. His greatest wish now is to expand his business and have a branch.

loans.use: to buy materials for his business.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita integra el Banco comunal “Amaican” perteneciente a la comuna de Pudahuel, ciudad de Santiago.
Ella se dedica a la realización de costuras en prendas para el hogar, entre los cuales se encuentran la realización de manteles y cortinas. Realiza cierta cantidad de prendas, posteriormente los guarda en bolsas individuales y recorre el sector donde vive, para luego ofrecerlos y venderlos. A sus clientes más antiguos les brinda facilidades de pago. 
Su taller lo tiene en su propia casa, donde trabaja desde hace 13 años. Margarita comenta que antes de dedicarse a las costuras se desempeñaba como maestra de cocina en un local de comida, sin embargo debido a un problema de salud, debió cambiar de rubro, sin embargo hace 2 años fue operada, por lo que ahora se encuentra solo en tratamiento y controles médicos. Su horario de trabajo es de lunes a viernes durante las tardes, los fines de semana se dedica a vender sus productos. 
Sus insumos los compra en la comuna de Independencia, ya que los precios son a bajo costo. 
Con el crédito comprará una máquina de coser recta y telas para realizar sus servicios de costuras. El resto del crédito lo invertirá en la compra de parafina, ya que durante la temporada de invierno aprovechará de vender.
Sus metas en su negocio son instalarse en un local establecido para ofrecer y vender sus costuras, esto le brindaría mayor tranquilidad y comodidad para su salud. 
Margarita vive junto a su hijo de 28 años de edad, quien trabaja de manera dependiente.
Sus sueños a nivel personal son reconstruir su casa con material solido para no pasar frio durante el invierno. Ella tiene ubicada en un terreno que le cedieron. Otro de sus sueños son poder brindarle ayuda de manera voluntaria a personas más desvalidas, por lo que actualmente se encuentra preparando almuerzos en una casa abierta para abuelitos.
Margarita está muy contenta y agradecida de los créditos y servicios obtenidos a través de Fondo esperanza. Gracias a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones del grupo del Banco comunal ha podido, administrar y organizar mejor su negocio. Comenta que las relaciones interpersonales en el grupo son muy buenas, el grupo es muy unido y realizan diversas actividades, que van fomentando esta buena relación. 
Pudahuel es una comuna del sector poniente de Santiago (capital de Chile), región Metropolitana. Es un vocablo del mapudungun (lengua mapuche) que se traduce como “lugar donde se juntan las aguas” o “lugar de charcos”, debido a que posee una variada red fluvial compuesta por el río Mapocho y los esteros Lampa, Carén y Las Cruces, lo que favorece sus suelos para la producción agrícola por la existencia de abundante agua subterránea.
texts.en:
Margarita is part of the communal  bank "Amaican" in Pudahuel, in the city of Santiago. She sews clothing for the home, such as tablecloths and curtains. She makes a certain amount of clothing, stores them in individual bags and then travels around the area where she lives to sell what she has made. To her older clients she offers credit facilities. Her workshop is located in her own home where she has worked for the last 13 years. Margarita says that before becoming a seamstress, she was a cooking teacher at a food store. However, due to health reasons she had to change direction. However she was operated on 2 years ago and now only has to undergo treatment and checkups. She works Monday through Friday in the afternoons and spends her weekends selling her products.  

She buys her consumables in the town of Independencia as the prices are inexpensive. With the loan she will buy an overlock sewing machine and fabric with which to run her sewing business. The remainder of the loan she will use to buy paraffin as she will make the most of the winter season to sell. 

Her business goal is to set up her business in a permanent location to offer and sell her sewing products. This would give her great peace of mind and be good for her health. Margarita lives with her son who is 28 years old and depends on others for work. Her dreams at a personal level are to rebuild her home with solid materials to keep them warm during the winter. Her house is located on a piece of land that was given to her. Another of her dreams is to help the less fortunate on a voluntary basis: she already prepares lunches at an open house for the aged. 

Margarita is very happy and thankful for the loans and services provided by Fondo Esperanza. Thanks to the training sessions given at the meetings of the communal bank group she has been better able to organize and administer her business. She says that the interpersonal relationships within the group are very good. The group is very united and undertakes diverse activities which encourage these good relationships. Pudahuel is a community in the western sector of Santiago (the capital of Chile), a metropolitan district. The name comes from the word magpudungun (from the Mapuche language) which means a "place where the waters meet" or  "place of puddles". because it has a diverse river network, comprising of the Mapocho river and the Lampa, Caren and Las Cruces streams which make the land here a good place for agriculture due to the abundance of underground water.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and fabric with which to run her sewing business.

loans.name: Presbiteria

texts.es: Presbiteria, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, tiene 39 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora con ganas de sobresalir en la vida, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Roberto de 57 años y sus 04 queridos hijos a quienes les brinda una educación adecuada. Presbiteria trabaja con mucho esmero para sobresalir adelante con sus plantas de cacao, café, achiote y palillo, las cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender hasta los centros de acopio situados en la ciudades de  Quimbiri y San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de sus frutos no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todos lo cosechado. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  13 años realizando esta actividad y considera que le es muy rentable por que gracias a ello mejoró las fachada de su morada. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos ya que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su primer crédito y esta muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y prosperar gracias al apoyo de todos ustedes. Con los 2,000 soles que solicita, comprará cortinas, trampas y mecheros para combatir la plaga de insectos que asechan sus sembrios.
texts.en: Presbiteria is a native of Quimbiri. She is 39 years old and is a cheerful and hardworking woman who wants to succeed in life. She lives in her own house with her partner Roberto who is 57 years old and their 4 beloved children for whom they want to provide an adequate education. Presbiteria works with great care to make her cocoa, coffee, achiote (a Latin American fruit) and pepper plants stand out. After harvesting she takes the crops to the collection centres in the cities of Quimbiri and San Francisco to sell as she already has several buyers there who knowing the quality of her product do not hesitate to wait and buy her entire harvest. What she likes the most about her work is sowing her land, making it fertile and productive. She has been doing this job for 13 years and feels that it is very profitable as thanks to it she was able to improve the front of her house. In the future, she hopes to continue saving her income as she wants to buy more land. This is her first loan and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support as this will make her feel safe to buy what she is asking for and thrive thanks to your support. With the 2000 soles (PEN) she is asking for, she will buy curtains, traps and burners to combat the plague of insects that infect her crops.

loans.use: to buy burners, curtains and traps to combat insects.

loans.name: Mujeres Del Complejo Group

texts.es:
La señora Celia es casada, tiene 61 años D. edad, tiene 7 hijos y ninguno D. ellos tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, se dedica a la artesanía, al tejido D. chamarras, inicio este trabajo desD. que era pequeña y hasta el momentos lleva 40 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien trabaja también en el tejido.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que servirá para la compra D. hilo, que es materia prima principal en la elaboración D. las chamarras. Las demás integrantes D. grupo se dedican a diversas actividades productivas: a la producción agrícola, a la crianza D. animales, al comercio y a  la artesanía.
texts.en:
Celia is married and 61 years old.  She has 7 children and none of them had the opportunity to attend school.  Celia makes handicrafts.  She knits jackets.  She started doing this work when she was a little girl and has 40 years experience.  She has the support of her husband who also knits.

Celia decided to form her group so that she could request a loan with which to buy yarn which is the main raw material she uses in making her jackets.  The other members of her group are engaged in a number of different business activities: farming, animal raising, selling goods and making handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy yarn for making jackets.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Elena de 36 años de edad casada,tiene una hija su esposo es comerciante y vende en varios municipios doña elena tiene su tienda de productos comestibles de primera nececiada,en el cual lleva 16 años de vemder ella esta solicitanso este credito para la compra de mas productos comestibles y asi surtir un poco mas su negocio y tener mas variedad en productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.el sueño de ella es agrandar mas su negocio y darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
